Received it in less than a day. Opened it up around 1 a.m. start playing music at 6 a.m. so I didn't wake the wife. Sound quality is very good the Bluetooth distance went throughout the house and upstairs through many walls. I can't get technical that is not me. Great price great sound and the fact I can link it with more flip fours in the future makes me happy

Bought this for my wife and she absolutely loves this speaker. Powerful enough without sounding distorted.  You get good enough base and clarity and that's all you can  ask for at this price point. Absolutely a great purchase and to me, better than some  of the newer models honestly. Buy this version and save yourself some money from the overbloated newer versions!!!
This is by far the great Bluetooth speaker I've owned.I am from India and I purchased this when I was at business trip to US.

Review would be 5 stars all the way if only it did not make the weird, unnecessarily loud noise when connecting to and disconnecting from bluetooth. i think it's supposed to be a pleasant musical chord which it most definitely is NOT! plus there is no way to control its volume.Also, i am a little ticked off that the description did not include the fact that a very nice zippered black carrying case with wrist strap is included. i purchased one at the same time because it was suggested in the "Frequently bought together" section and i thought it would be good to have on my upcoming beach vacation. Just a waste of money, don't really need a spare, and shipping cost to return it is more than half the cost of the case.

My friend has the bigger version I don‚Äôt know the model name, I figured this should be as good , and I was wrong. Obviously it‚Äôs smaller so it won‚Äôt be as loud , but it‚Äôs not bad at all though, I just wished it had more of a stronger bass kick. Other than that I like it , it works, portable, and good enough. Long battery life!

Bought it for my nice 15th birthday;  I took it to Brazil this summer and gave to her, since she lives there.  This week she send me a message telling me that the speaker doesn't work anymore. She used it just for less than two months. She has tried a new charger cable and different outlets on the house and it doesn't work...How can Amazon help me to solve this matter?

Have contacted Harmon service for the JBL, got a quick response but their solution has not worked, my return date has passed, bought this to PAIR with other Flip4 speakers, but this one has trouble even connecting with my iPad or iPhone, and when it does it Crackles, Skips...Very maddening, not worth the Time and Effort to try to repeatedly turn on & off, recycle per Harmons instructions, basically IT SUCKS, waste of $75

Loved the 1st JBL 4 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker we purchased 2 years ago that I had to buy another when it was on sale. We can easily pair both speakers and get a bit of a surround sound feeling when using outside on the back deck. Have never had any issues with our JBP 4 products. Would highly recommend. Love JBL

only had this a few months but so far it works great.  I use it outside on patio. It has a pretty good range. I connect it to my cell phone with Pandora and leave the phone inside the house and close the door and it works fine.

This is perfect for the home or by the pool... Even a barbecue. Sound is good and the battery lasts pretty long. My only gripe is that it turns off pretty fast after you disconnect and you have to power it on manually in order to reconnect. Not a huge deal but I wish it had a stand by feature so that you could just connect to it whenever you felt like it.
We really loved this portable speaker, especially with its surprisingly rich bass sound. But for some inexplicable reason it just up and died after only 18 months of relatively infrequent use.

I wasn‚Äôt expecting to be blown away by the deep rich tones or crisp highs. Frankly it doesn‚Äôt have much range but for the price and it‚Äôs purpose it‚Äôs one of the better sounding portable speakers. I like that with the app you can setup multiple flip 4‚Äôs. Battery gets a solid 8-10 hours at mid to low volume. I haven‚Äôt had the chance to crank it for extended periods of time but it‚Äôs teally not that kind of speaker anyway. Overall it‚Äôs a great speaker and I will use it often especially while traveling.

This Speaker It's poor quality, I bought it for  my husband on Dec. 2, 2019 as a Christmas gift, it worked for only 2 months and started having  battery problems in February so the battery doesn't charge and the speaker dies in 5 minutes when in use. I do not recommend this item. I tried to return it and it says that return date has been expired on 01/31/20.PS My husband started using the speaker December 26 after Christmas

I bought the first one for my husband and he loves it! We even took it with us on a cruise to the Caribbean.  Just bought a second one for my dad's Christmas gift because he really liked my husband's and again, it did not disappoint! My father even took it on a trip to Mexico and he is loving it! So glad for this little gadget! Will definitely come back to get a third soon!

I like the camouflage design, like the volume, dislike the battery life. My workplace is a warehouse where I load delivery trucks (funny, right?). When the belt is on, my work environment is VERY loud and I needed a speaker that could drown out THAT noise with my own music. I've used it twice at work so far and with the volume all the way up the battery life lasts 3.5 hours. I need the speaker to work twice as long. If the product states on the box that it's going to last 12 hours, then it should last 12 hours even when the volume is up all the way. Still a good speaker but the battery life is a deal breaker for me. I'll give it try again with the volume not all the way up and then update if needed.**Update. Used it today at work with the volume not all the way up and it lasted the same. The box says it is supposed to last 12 hours yet it didn't even do half of that. I am returning.

Bought this for my dad after his JBL Flip 2 finally wore out. He uses this every single day, all day long. The quality has increased since the original design and the sound is great. Not gonna blow your ear drums out and doesn't have ridiculous bass but it is plenty loud and sounds great. Battery life seems great so far and I know if I have any problems Harmon international "JBL" will stand behind their product. I would and will buy JBL products again when the time comes.

I enjoyed using this speaker for about the first 12 months. I've used it for listening to conference calls, attached to my PC for audio (music and movies), connected to my devices via Bluetooth and streaming music. After about a year of use though, the device has started acting up. The issue appears to be battery related. I can no longer use it at higher volumes. When I do, it will work for about 15-45 seconds before it starts making a crackling sound and then shut off. I can prevent it from happening by lowering the volume. The only way to use it is to run it a lower volumes which is not ideal for outdoor use, my main reason for purchasing it. I might buy a replacement battery for it in hopes to restore its usability, but I'm looking at other Bluetooth speakers.

Phenominal bass for such a little speaker. Sound quality is very impressive, and it doesn't get fuzzy when turned up to the max. Hands down best Bluetooth speaker I've ever owned. Almost got one of the bose speakers because a friend had one and I really liked it, but went with the JBL based on reviews and noe that I have it and listened to music on it I know I made the better choice.

JBL has an amazing sound quality.  We have several of these.  We take two to the beach and pair them for surround sound.  Waterproof and long playing on a single charge.  This is the smaller one but still has big sound.  Not exactly as crisp as our Bose but in a blind sound test it would be hard to tell which was which and for the value JBL wins hands down!

Honestly a very good speaker.  However you can't use it with an aux cable.  When it's plugged in, the sound cuts out whenever what you're listening to gets too quiet.  I constantly miss lines in movies when using this.  Apparently this is a feature in which the speaker enters "sleep mode" to save power whenever it thinks there's just silenece, and then takes a few seconds to reengage.  The problem is that it will enter sleep mode almost immediately, constantly cutting out sections of what you're listening to.  If "sleep mode" kicked in after a minute it might be a good feature, but right now it's a very limiting bug.  I won't buy anything from JBL again so long as this continues.

This Bluetooth speaker works great! We spend lots of time out on the back deck and the iPad's built-in speakers are not loud enough even on a quiet day in the neighborhood. The Flip 4 not only lets us both hear the sound but it gives us the low end and clarity that is lacking in the iPad speakers. Making a Bluetooth connection can't be easier than this. The weight is right, as well. It stays put where we place it.

I Looked I to Purchasing My Own JBL Flip 4 After My Landlord Got Tired Of Me Borrowing Hers, LOL.  She Got Hers Through Verizon Wireless Almost 2yrs Ago For Almost $160!!!  I Told Her That They Are On Amazon For Way Less Than That...Anyways, I Don't Use Mine Via Bluetooth, I Always Use An AUX Cable When It's Hooked Up To My ZTE Blade V8 Pro Or To My Dell and Acer Laptops.  Watching YouTube Videos and Movies Comes Through Loud & Clear With The JBL!!!

I bought this for my husband's car. It doesn't have bluetooth and he really wanted to listen to audiobooks. We had different brand of speaker and it was never very good. It finally died and we got this one and it was a world of difference! The sound quality is amazing, connectivity is immediate, and it fits in his cupholder. Great purchase!!! Would highly recommend.

This little guy kicks really well. The range is great, you hear the bass yet it doesn't drown out the treble. Lasts all day of constant use and charges quick. Will play while charging. I take this skateboarding with me almost daily.Cool feature it will pair with another like JBL and play the same music so you have 2 speakers playing even though only 1 is actually connected to your device.

This is one trusty little speaker. I originally was going to purchase the sonos sound system, but ended up getting this since my husband already has one in Black. Mostly because he really likes his, and I like the idea that we could sync our two speakers together. It does the job for its small size, and the sound quality is pretty good to for the price. It can get very loud, and the small subwoofer(?) on the end gives it a nice bass. Overall I‚Äôm happy I chose this!Pros: cylindrical design

I've been using this speaker for a month or so now. The radiators are absolutely powerful. This lil speaker packs a huge punch. Sometimes I would use it for long hours of studying and it'll last seemingly all day. As expected from reading other reviews, the cable that came with it has already gone faulty. Not a problem since I have plenty of micro usb cables. I recommend to charge the speaker from a computer since there has been known issues of the speaker's battery going faulty as well. The manual doesn't say anything about charging recommendations but the box likely came without a power adapter for reason.

I bought one of these for my dad a couple of years ago and he LOVES it. Uses it at work all the time. The range is great, battery is excellent, and it still runs perfectly even though it‚Äôs been dropped, splashed with water, and surrounded with sawdust, drywall dust, and other particulates. I bought another for a friends graduation gift and he loves it as well. I did order a red speaker, but I received a black. But it‚Äôs not a big deal. I‚Äôll be buying one of my own when I have the money

The sound quality that BOOMS from this miniature speakers puts me in a state of awe!  Technology moves so quickly and I've bought ... countless speakers over the past 2 years.  This is definitely one of the best little speakers on the market!I wouldn't use it for a huge party, but it's perfect for a picnic (intimate or family style), workout session motivation, background music while cleaning or entertaining.

I heard about this portable bluetooth speaker and i couldn't decide which brand was the best for me, because of the price, the quality, the modelthe colors... and well i decided to try with JBL.. and i fell in love... the first time i tried my new speaker the sound of the music was

I was looking for a portable, Bluetooth, water resistant or waterproof speaker for out on the deck and by the pool.  As I have seen others write, I was overwhelmed by the selection there was.  I finally settled on this JBL speaker and although I have only had it 1 day, I LOVE it.  I am NOT a speaker or sound expert, but to me It sounds great and was easy to set up. Also, it was easy to pair with my audio devices (particularly my echo dot that I will use out on the deck with it in the summer).  I wish I had known I was going to like it this much... I would have bought 2 at the special Christmas shopping price to be able to do the stereo mode or even the party mode (to include the yard).  Maybe they will put it on sale again before Christmas!  At t his point, I am very pleased with selecting this item.

I really love this speaker. The sound quality is very nice and I love that I can connect it with my friends' other JBL 4 speakers as well. It's truly water and sand proof and I use it in the shower or on the beach all the time! Plus the battery life is really long so I will use it for several days without charging it once.The only thing I wish it had was controls to skip/go back songs on the speaker, but that's just an extra feature I'd like and not something that's necessary.

Hands down the best sound of any speaker in this price range. Trust me I physically tested them all, watched the YouTube videos, etc.I traveled w the flip 3 for a year and it was awesome having it. I lost it and wanted to see if anything better, but as I mentioned after testing them all I went to the flip 4.

Input is buggy: if I try to listen with an aux cord when a different phone is nearby that I've used Bluetooth with, the speaker will constantly drop the music from the phone that is physically connected and play white noise (and yes I've tested this with different aux cords). I expect Bluetooth connections to be spotty sometimes, but it's supper annoying that it overrides a phone that is physically connected, for a phone that doesn't have anything playing on it.It's also really hard to get the little flap that protects the plug inputs open, but that's just a minor annoyance.  Sound quality is fine and battery life is good.

I would have given it 5 stars but the instructions were not clear on the set up.  I had to look it up on you tube.,  Once set up I loved it and the sound quality is great.  I have only used it once since it is a recent purchase so not sure about the battery life.  I played it all night at a ladies night and the battery was fine.  The blue tooth connectivity worked fine.

I never wrote a review for any seller, because I give them the benefit of the doubt, but JBL you gave me a reason to write.I bought a JBL Speakers last year (JBL Charge 3) which had stopped working for no reason, it was a gift to my brother, and he doesn't live here, so I couldn't return it.
Great Sound! I just wish the battery would last a little longer. I've had previous versions of JBL speakers and I have to say the older ones still have better battery life than the new ones.

Don't waste your money on cheaper alternatives as I did. They just went back. This speaker has great sound quality, including the bass. I struggled with it connecting a few times but it may have been my wifi.  My son has the charge 3 and he keeps stealing mine. The charge 3, which we always thought had excellent sound, now sounds muddled compared to this. Great purchase!

Can't believe how much my husband loves this thing.  He's carried it around every day since I bought it.  I have a Bose portable speaker and he always says his is better.  (For the record, the JBL is more treble and the Bose is more bass, so it's a matter of opinion.)

Sound quality is just alright, nothing special, I've had cheaper speakers with better quality, especially oddly enough at lower volume levels. The speaker also shuts off much to quickly if there is no music playing. The pairing process can also be confusing, instead of voice prompts, it just plays a series of music notes, with no documentation as to what those symbolize. Power button is also very difficult to push in. Upgrading the firmware via the smartphone app took over 45 minutes to download and install, which is unacceptable.

This little speaker gives me 12-18 hours of continuous play depending on the volume setting. It charges much better through my computer than a wall outlet. The sound is amazingly crisp and clear for such a small speaker. I have given these speakers as gifts to my favorite family members. I recommend any music enthusiast that loves to be outdoors add this to their list of must haves.

We bought one JBL a while ago which just stopped charging. We liked the sound and portability so much we purchased two JBL's afterwards. First one needs to be used connected to the charger. Does horrible noises often thus, we barely use it even though we got two of them to link around the house. The first time we were able to do that was pretty neat, didn't last long. Second JBL breaks up while music is playing, very unpleasant. Checked Bluetooth connection, WIFI, battery... still breaks up. Honestly great sound but not a product that has lasted more than a year. Contacting JBL directly and hopefully their "guarantee" does something for us...

I bought this speaker for the bathroom. Sound quality is great, even when turned up loud.  Battery charge life is surprisingly long.  I don‚Äôt have any complaints and am glad I purchased this speaker.  If I had to find something negative, I think it‚Äôs a little lacking in bass, but it‚Äôs much better than other similar speakers.

This speaker completes me! It sounds awesome It works awesome and it holds a charge nicely! i use this pretty much daily and at a bar that sounds amazing through the whole bar! my customers ask about it all the time, is that seriously that little thing playing music? Yup that my baby JBL Flip 4 ~ rumor has it that it can be submerged under water too... i am not doing it to mine but how cool is that?!? HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!

For the most part they just work.  The only issue I observed is when link mulitple speakers at a party.  If other persons at the party have paired with the speakers as well you may have dropouts on some of the speakers.  Otherwise this is great.  I bought one because my friend had two and they are awesome for parties anywhere.

Awesome speaker but save the box and paperwork because 2 weeks short of the warranty expired it stopped taking a charge...but I contacted them right away and I‚Äôm getting a brand new one upgraded because the don‚Äôt make these anymore.  According to tracking information I should be getting my new one.  But had to return the old one.  But if you need to fix it after the warranty expired go to U-Tube for directions to fix it

I didn't really need a speaker that could go down a meter in the water, so there's extra weight for that kind of protection, though it also seems pretty indestructible and well made. The sound is very heavily weighted to the bass, so I have to use an equalizer on my devices to make it listenable for me. Connects easily to any device.

The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of five is cause you can change the song on the speaker. You have to change it on the device you are listing on. Other then that the sound is great and very loud if you turn it up all the way. The bass is not as loud as I would like it but you can tell its there. Over all I do like the speaker except the part were you can not change the song on the speaker.

I've had the speaker for 1 day, but I have used it for hours. I don't consider myself an audiophile, but I think the sound quality is fantastic. The level of bass, given the size and price of the speaker, is very good. I am using it with a laptop in my home office today with a streaming radio service. Last night I used it to watch television in the bedroom- via Roku remote on my iPhone. The quality of the materials is nice, and it has a solid feel. The range of the blue-tooth is great. It is plenty loud for my needs, and I like that I could pair up another one.

I finally got my little speaker wet, and it stopped working right. I had in my Kayak tied off to me, when I rolled out of my kayak. I have a little fishing kayak I was going down the river in. I became off balanced and flipped out. There not large rapids, it's just a cheap kayak and poor center of gravity.  At any rate the water wasn't very deep and I was able to stand up, drain and jump back in my kayak. Speaker keeps connecting and disconnecting now. When it worked, it had pretty good sound, good volume, ok bass line for it's size.

Plugged in 35 mm jack from projector audio  output and all background music is gone.  Voices only.  Plugged into my son's JBL Flip 3 and it sounded like a freakin; orchestra !  Disappointed in that.  Otherwise, it sounds good and connects well.  Thankfully, my son is going to let me use his Flip 3 on Halloween.

It's smaller than I expected but it sounds quite good and gets loud enough for my indoor and outdoor needs.  My kids love doing "dance parties" with it (OMG, that baby shark song will never get out of my brain now) and we use it by the pool without issue.  Works well with our 2017 iPad, an iPhone 5S, and my LG G5 Android phone.The JBL apps are horrible, don't install them. You don't need them to use this speaker, avoid them.

Sound quality is good enough and it survived a few dunks in the pool over the summer. It's not going to beat your home theater system but probably sounds a lot better than other small BT speakers. I was impressed by the lows/mids on such a small speaker. Switching phones and connecting to bluetooth is effortless. Overall impressed and happy with my purchase.

the speakers are not as consistent with sound resolution as described. I called already about the intermittent problem I've been having and it doesn't seem like either JBL or Amazon cares to acknowledge the problem. I was told by JBL to do a factory reboot of the speaker that seemed to work for a little while but then it started to randomly give feed back sounds during use. Its to bad but I wouldn't recommend these cheap little speakers to anyone. When the speakers are not giving the feed back noise they are great and i especially liked the JBL Connect concept, that's why I bought 2. Boy was I swindled!

Give it 3 stars overall because it doesn't charge while turned on.I've been struggling with this when battery dies and wanted to keep using the speaker so I connect it to the charger but the speaker will only charge when turned off.

For what it is worth, I bought this in 2017 and it is now mar 2019 and the device has failed. It worked well at first but it seems the batter will no longer hold a charge. I mostly used it While it was plugged in. Also the bass notes, prior to total failure would have a horrible bottoming out rattle as the battery charge got low. Good little speaker but do yourself a favor and just buy a different brand speaker. For the 100$ this thing is now garbage. Never once was it dropped or got wet. It sat on the shelf in my kitchen.
I wanted a speaker that was more bassier, water resistant, and louder than my phone. The flip 4 certainly did well in that part.Pros:

Welp, had it just over a year and the subwoofer just went out. Only used it about 3-4 hours a day Monday - Friday (typically) and never more that just above half volume. When it was working it worked great! Wish Amazon wouldn‚Äôt have closed out the contact info so I could see if there was anything that could be done about it.

Got this speaker for my mom as a Christmas gift. She loved it!!!. This small speaker puts an incredible amount of sound and clarity. For the price you cant go wrong. Its a well know brand, and it looks sleek with any home/office decor.  The quality is as expected, per JBL standards. It feels nice and solid , good enough for the outdoors.  This speaker would make a great add on for a garage especially when you're working on a project.A+++
Excellent sound.  Amazing small for its clarity.Crispness can be heard on guitar or violin recordings.

I had the Oontz Angle Plus which I thought were excellent. I gave the Oontz to my relatives when I visited the Philippines because they loved them so much. I bought these as a replacement and there is no comparison. They sound much better and roughly the same size.

So far so good. The only thing is that when using both there is a ton of static and they cut in and out while playing music and they are not even turned up loud. Separately they work fine but when syncing them together it‚Äôs terrible I might be sending them both back and getting something else.2/27/18 Update: I've had the speakers ( I am only using one at the moment) for maybe two weeks now. The battery life on this is not great at all. I charged it for a full day and used the very next day on a low volume and the battery was at half percent the next morning. It's a good speaker; loud and the bass is great but overall the battery life sucks.

Nice speaker. Mids and highs are nice and clear even at max volume. As with all speakers this small, there is no real bass to speak. For battery life reference, I have a JBL Flip 3 that I play at work at low volumes (Five ‚Äú+‚Äù volume clicks up from 0). I get about 10 hours of playtime. Outside at 100% volume with the Flip 4, I get about 2 hours. The Flip 3 and 4 both have a 3000mAh battery so they should be pretty similar. I bring the Flip 4 kayaking and have even spent time with it in the hot tub. The IPX7 rating really holds up. Just make sure the cover for the Aux /USB port is closed.

I bought this solely for work, I work in a 150,000 sq foot warehouse and my area consists of about 1/4th of that. I have it on full blast and the quality is great..I wish it was a little louder due to forklifts always around my desk & the battery last longer but it does its job.

I had an older model JBL for years (at least 5 years) and loved it. The charger input stopped working and I would need to wiggle it to get it to pick up the charger. Eventually that stopped working too and I had to retire it. I wanted another JBL but worried nothing would compare to my old one. This one is excellent! Better than my old one. It is waterproof which my last one wasn‚Äôt and the sound quality is superior. It gets very loud and the battery lasts for a very long time. I have no complaints about this speaker whatsoever!

Actually worked FINE for a month, then wouldn't pair with anything.  I tried everything.  Called customer support, tried different sources, talked to tech people, had a tech person come by......NOTHING.  JUST past the 2 month window from Amazon.  I have to throw it in the trash.  Too bad, I liked the sound.

When it first arrived the Flip 4 worked beautifully.  I use it almost exclusively indoors, for showers and living room ambiance. Recently the quality of the sound began degrading drastically. The lows are now basically inaudible. The sound as a whole is muffled and weak. I would not recommend this product if you're looking for something that lasts.

For what it's worth, I'm a musician and lover of quality audio. But I might be really bad at both, so take this with a grain of salt.I need tunes everywhere I go. In the garage, bathroom, funerals, etc. Some friends have JBL bluetooth speakers, and the sound really impressed me. So I bought the Flip 4 and I couldn't be happier! The sound is clear, big, and full. I have a macbook pro, and when I pair the two (with a quality chardonnay) it makes watching videos/movies a giggling joy!

Incredible sound quality from just one ‚Äî but pair it with a second one and be prepared to be blown away!!!  Sounds like a system costing thousands. Almost like being at a rock concert!  So easy to pair together and with an iPhone ‚Äî unlike another brand I tried first.  They fill a room with clear, crisp, bright sound. Great bass from such a small size. Stunningly brilliant!!

Some toys you purchase in life turn out to be your favorites.  This little speaker has turned out to be one of those great toys.  So handy, portable and the sound quality from the little size is excellent meeting all of my needs.  Portability, small size, battery life and sound quality; I‚Äôm very impressed with my JBL Flip 4.  Would definitely purchase again should something happen to it.  Would also consider buying a larger one for all of the above reasons should the need for more sound arise.
Awesome sound! Great price!JBL makes a good product for a reasonable price. I had a really great speaker made by HK. It was about $300 and I had it for about 6 years. I was heartbroken when it died.

Great product, sounds amazing, and is definitely waterproof!  I take it out on my boat and have never been happier with the sound quality and peace of mind I get from knowing water won‚Äôt hurt it!  As long as you attach it to the boat or something that floats you have zero to worry about!Can use this version as a speaker phone as well. It‚Äôs not crystal clear, but it‚Äôs better than having to pick up your phone while driving a boat!

Great sound for the price. I take it everywhere and get many inquires. Most say they "settled" on a cheaper, small hockey puck sized thingy, and wish they had known.Great battery life, and quick blue-tooth reception, the best of all of my BT devices. A bargain!

Sound quality is perhaps not the best I've heard but if I consider its formfactor, it produces a good quality sound.  Small enough to fit in your hand (holding).  Less buttons but does all needed such as skipping pausing etc.  Use it a lot in my showers and vocal sound is pretty clear listening to audiobooks/podcasts.  Design is also beautiful.  I find it masculine.  Nice it has a holding string/hook.

Impressed with quality. Really great sound, especially for the size. I dont need to max out the volume. I bought 2 of these and syncing them both up to my iphone is super easy with the app. It takes about 10 seconds.Taking away one star, because I feel like a wall based charger piece should have been included.

My last outdoor Bluetooth speaker bit the dust. My search for an inexpensive Bluetooth speaker that was conducive for outdoor use began. I read the reviews of many speakers including Bose. Decided on the JBL Flip 4. Fast shipment and it was packaged well. Easy to pair with my IPhone. But the best part was the quality of sound. This little speaker packs a punch. I'm so very pleased with my decision to purchase the Flip 4. Highly recommend!
Bought 2 of these, one for a gift, and the other one for my own. Overall, the quality is fine, I just really don't like how the battery life decreases so fast as time goes by.
Speaker was great until it stopped charging after about 7 months. JBL would not issue me another speaker and takes back my defective one. Horrible experience dealing with those people, stay away!

Bought it for my husband, did a connect and play and now I just have to have my own because it has really good sound, bass could be better but for a small portable speaker I'm impressed by the quality

I bought this speaker about a year ago, its a great little soeaker with good sound quality/volume. I have used it quite a few times around the water and it has not had an issuue. It quickly became my go to Bluetooth speaker, with a good size for just stuffing into a backpack to bring along. Unfortunately recently it took a bit of a fall from the perch I had it set on out in the campsite, from that moment on it hasn‚Äôt worked the same and the volume/quality was ruined. It fell about 2‚Äô but its built well so I fogured it would be fine, unfortunately that wasn‚Äôt the case. Speaker would be 5/5 if this hadn‚Äôt happened, since then I havee brought speaker to be recycled since it no longer works to the level it had in the past, back to my old bose Bluetooth speaker :( :(

After 6 weeks, this speaker began to cut in and out during use.  It also never paired with my iPhone 7 -- they're either incompatible or it's part of the defect.  When I contacted the seller about it, they said sorry, it's past 1 month and not our responsibility.  The told me to contact the manufacturer.  All I can say is I'm terribly disappointed with this experience and seller.

I just wanted a bluetooth speaker for my phone and my laptop...  Reviews led me to jbl flip 4.  I totally love it so far.  Mostly I need excellent sound quality at all volumes...  If there was even a slight problem with sound quality I would return it and get something else...  This speaker is Very good quality...  Connectivity is instant, reliable.  Battery life is way beyond what i expected.  I am way more than satisfied right now... I take it with me everywhere !

I have a granddaughter that loves to listen to music while in the shower. I got her this for Christmas and she loves it. She says it is durable and well worth my money...ok. I have to agree with her because she is notorious for breaking everything she gets in the first week, however, her JBL Flip 4 is still going so it has to be tough.

I cannot speak highly enough about this speaker! First of all, the color is gorgeous and comes in many others of course. The sound is amazing and definitely projects out which is great for parties. It was super easy to connect to my phone and the battery life stays pretty long as well!

The sound quality is not bad just don‚Äôt listen with volume turned all the up. Loud enough for most uses. Sound quality is pretty good. I use mine in garage during exercise. Only thing the charging cable is defective. The plastic in USB PLUG is centered it should be off set. Plug does not fit. Not a deal breaker though. I have other plugs that fit. Other wise I would give 5 stars

Liked- speaker is compact and convenient to take anywhere, good size, not too heady, sound quality really good except...read belowDisliked-when the speaker is playing music on low it sounds really good but once you raise the volume, it makes the sound quality flat...not sure why this happens and I tried different songs but it was the same...I like to blast my music so you except to have the same quality sound either on low and high volume.

I love this speaker!! It's durable (has handled many drops). It's waterproof (assuming you shut the charging cover). It has a lot of bass for a small speaker and it has loud volume for a smaller sized speaker. Although I would 100% recommend this speak, definitely check out the JBL Charge 3 (it's similar to this but a little bigger). It definitely depends on what you're looking for but I love this speaker.

I read lots of reviews and was a bit worried. Not anymore I love to listen to jazz music in the evening on my patio and this speak allows great quality sound. I have also put it through a few paces it survived hiking it the desert when it was 100 plus degrees so that I had a little music to watch the sun go down. Great buy maybe not meant to be blasted with a ton of bass but classical, jazz rock and country all seem clear and crisp!

Unfortunately the speaker I ordered 6 months ago is not authentic, coming from Abe‚Äôs Electronic Center. I was very skeptical at the beginning and I wanted to hold up the warranty that was expected from this company, though trying to contact them multiple occasions was useless as I was sent to contact JBL for warranty, so neither of them would guarantee a warranty as expected. JBL speakers ARE AMAZING, unless they‚Äôre fraudulent. Abe‚Äôs Electronic center I just contacted a few minutes ago was a representative who was extremely rude and kept on reading amazons customer service number and calling me wrong. Beforehand, I contacted amazon before that and they instructed me to call Abe‚Äôs Electronic Center. Overall the speaker I purchased was fake and I‚Äôm extremely disappointed I lost my money when i made this purchase. The speaker I have does not retain the same bass quality, the durability isn‚Äôt real as the RUBBER edges are now peeling off which can be seen on the front and at the bottom of the left speaker. The stitching between the fake (left) and real (right) JBL speakers are also different where in person I can see through the stitching for the fraudulent speaker. The fake one is smaller and the quality is noticeably lacking. No longer can I trust online purchases from Amazon for simple speaker brands as the authenticity is questionable, ultimately I am NOT satisfied.

I can't believe I forgot to review this. I use this thing daily and the sound quality is superb. It is SO LOUD, lightweight and durable. The battery lasts a long time too. My drunk self bought this and I honestly do not regret it at all. Great for parties.

the speaker had connectivity problems from the beginning. it would sometimes interrupt the playing even when the phone was close to the speaker.after about 10 month the speaker started to shout down even when it was plugged in to electricity

The speaker is honestly really great. The sound quality is awesome and the volume is very powerful as well. My husband and I both have our own speaker for us to use at our workplaces. For me, the battery life is fine since I don‚Äôt have the volume up very loud. My husband, on the other hand, has to have his very loud at work, so his battery depletes really fast. He can only play it for three hours from a full charge before it dies on him, while mine can last all day long without charging at the lower volume settings. Other than the battery, the speaker is great!

I use this speaker in the shower, watching movies on my computer and listening to music.  It has very good sound quality and a long battery life.  The Bluetooth is easy to connect.  It‚Äôs not very heavy so it‚Äôs easy to carry and very portable.  It‚Äôs easy to charge on the computer and charges quickly.

l like the sound it has, l use it for my motorcycle,  When l get to where l'm going l have music l can bring with me anywhere l go.. The other day l rode my motorcycle to the shore, to go fishing.. l had music all the way there when l got there, and even on my way home.. l love the speaker..

They sound pretty good if you play just one but if you link it to party mode you get a lot of feedback out of One of them usually I don‚Äôt recommend it better off going with the Bose I have no problems with it I wish I can get all the Bose exchange all of them I return most of them their junk it‚Äôs OK if you play one by itself the flip 4 or the flip 5 I‚Äôve had both of them.

Turned it on connect the Bluetooth through my smartphone and worked perfectly. The sound is awesome with clear crisp mediums and highs. The base is where I thought it is better then expected. I would never have expected the base to be so clear from such a small box. Totally recommend this for outside of anywhere like in the shower or at the pool. We even used it on a hike.

I was impressed with the audio - great bass that‚Äôs rich and full. Highs are crisp too. Blows away the cheap speakers I had ($30 range). Hope the battery holds up better than that one did too. I've been using this critter for a few months now... and now I'm convincing all my friends to buy one, and the best part ? We can link them all together during gatherings/tailgating/camping... and other events. The sounds is insane good coming from such a small package.

I have a Bose Soundlink Color bluetooth speaker that my wife decided was hers.  I didn't want to spend over $100 so I purchased the JBL Flip for for my travels for roughly $85. After seeing my music friends use JBL for years, I finally invested in a JBL. I actually caved because I wanted something that could carry music when hanging out in my backyard. This is the 2nd JBL speaker I've had, the first being a Clip2 I got about 3 years ago which has had almost daily use and continues to go strong with only just recently showing signs of the battery starting to wear out. So far the Flip4 has been great. Super loud, good clarity and bass. Battery life is excellent, my phone will go dead before this thing will. I was so happy to have this, worked like a dream at my house in my backyard. Even updated and reset my speaker, the issue persists!

Use it to improve music sound from Alexa for small condo. It is ok. Sometimes music transition from Alexa to speaker stutters.Have much better Bluetooth speaker I use with phone but it would  not connect to Alexa. Maybe try a different brand

I‚Äôm really impressed with this speaker! I bought it because I couldn‚Äôt find my Bose Bluetooth speaker in my stupid storage unit... I looked and looked but gave up and forked over the cash for this speaker and I don‚Äôt regret it one bit! It sounds just as good as my Bose does... and if I ever find that sucker, I‚Äôll acrually be able to test them back to back. Anyway, get this one üòä

If you want better battery life, spend a bit more to get the Charge 3+ also sound quality on my Charge 2+ is better, crisp and good low bass. I've owned the charge 2+ for over 2 years and battery still runs for 8hrs. Bought the Flip 4 a few months and I is less heavy than the charge 2, it doesn't charge my phone, louder than the Charge 2 but distort after you get close to max volume. Battery goes for about 4 to 5 playtime.

A year & a half later the batteries completely died!  Loved the look of this camo portable speaker and even had great sound.  But the battery started acting up.  Now it‚Äôs dead!!  I won‚Äôt be tossing out another $100 for speakers like this again.

I love these speakers.  My nephew dropped one of these in the kids wading pool... no big deal, and they link up which is awesome.  They put out enough sound for a good size party, and have bass response that's pretty good. great upgrade from my old JBL bluetooth speakers.and these were cheaper!

Wow, the sounds is significantly better than I had expected. Yes, I tried this speaker in some store before buying it, and it sounds much better at home when you eliminate the typical store surroundings not friendly to an audio listening experience.Almost all the time, audio is streamed from an iPhone to this device; I have not used any other input[, yet]

This thing is incredible.  I didn't expect such a rich sound from such a small device. Good volume as well.  Rich tight low end, sparkling highs, and smooth mids.  My only complaint is it gets really glitchy when I want to use it with my desktop.  Works great with streaming music from your phone but, when connected to a desktop it stutters and then pauses and causes the video (if you're watching youtube for example) to pause as well.  Strange. Not my inteded use so it's no big deal.  And, other than that, has been an excellent purchase.  Recommended

received in one day . turned on and sound and quality are both great . of course this is not a full stereo system  . but for a grab and go speaker running off Bluetooth with the great selection of amazon prime music you can't go wrong with the JBL flip4 sound is very nice , I mounted between the handle bars on my motorcycle turned up volume and it great . very happy with the unit so far

The sound is good for the price but the battery is terrible. Its just been over a month and the thing doesn't play over an hour on top volume. At the lowest volume it is not even close to 12 hours as mentioned. Save your money and don't buy this.

We had the Charge a while ago and just after year of using it outside it quit on us. We bought other Bluetooth speakers but nothing lasted more than a summer. We spend a lot of time outdoors in the water, mud, or gravel dust. So we went back to the JBL brand and this one is perfect! It plenty loud for just hanging out.
Dose not hold a charge and not loud at all
Needed a blue tooth speaker for out by our pool. This mighty little speaker is it. Sounds great unless you just need to spend money. Very pleased with purchase.

I have owned the first JBL Flip for many years now and used it daily unfortunately the battery just can't keep up like it used to. I decided to purchase the JBL Flip 4 because of my prior experiences. It's good and is water proof(does not float) I t is not a loud and clear as the original, but it does have the option to connect multiple units together to achieve stereo even a sorts of surround sound.

It's a nice speaker but according to the description, it comes with a charger and a cord which I didn't receive.  I requested one so I can only wait and see if this $100 speaker can be charged as it needs to be

This Bluetooth speaker is excellent. I also own a Bose Soundlink Mini, which has superb audio, but this is darned good for less than half the money I paid for the Bose. I mainly use this as my office music speaker but have also used it for watching movies. Have never run it out of battery, so am very happy with the battery life. I think its a good deal for the price and it sounds great to me.

As soon as I turn it on it immediately connects to my phones Bluetooth. The battery lasts for weeks for me. And the sound... Oh, the sound. I was shocked at the depth and clarity that this little thing produces. Absolutely stunning. Deep bass, crisp highs, and clear mids. Everything you could ask for in a speaker this size.

After I accidently ran over my 14 year old son's wireless beat ear buds, I promised him I'd replace. He opted for a wireless speaker and picked this one out himself.  MAN!  It sounds great!  Has great volume, clear and really holds a charge.  He loves it!  Couldn't be happier.

This has the bass, depth, and output to take over for some party speakers. The protection on it is an added bonus. I struggle just a bit opening the spot to charge the device, but that‚Äôs good to keep it waterproof. The flap does press on the charge cable so be wary of the cable getting bent and no longer charging, and fixed by getting a new cable.

Love it!! Wish there was a button to switch over to the next bluetooth device. My husband and I have both of our phones connected and we have to "forget device" in order to switch over. Battery life is great too. We had a bbq for over 4 hours and there was no loss of sound or had any issue. I think our phone ran out of battery first. Overall, the sound quality is superb and worth the money.

I bought the JBL Flip 3 on the recommendation of friends who rave about their JBL bluetooth speaker. I bought this one on Amazon while on sale and have been thoroughly impressed with the sound quality, volume, and range. I use it while working out, on my bike trainer, working in the garage, or just hanging out with the kids outdoors. I could not be more pleased with it at this point in time! I also purchased a travel case, which I highly recommend for protecting your investment.

I have a hard time connecting to other JBL speakers, it connects to phone quickly, but it's supposed to connect to 100 speakers and i don't see how when it keeps cutting up the music, chopped up sound. I LOVE the idea, but haven't been able to make it work. I will update if it changes for me. I've had them since November. JBL charge 3, and two of the JBL Flip 4.

This little speaker is amazing. Sound quality is great, but that is expected from JBL. My home theater is JBL too. I like that it is waterproof/resistant. The only thing is I wish there was a cover for the little bass speaker ends. I worry that something could puncture or perforate the speakers while out and about with it.
Love this speaker but now after year and half it is going out on me, only used it in my apartment!! Think I'll go Bose for the replacement!

Great sounding, waterproof, Bluetooth speaker ! Use them with your phone or anything Bluetooth or plug your sound source in. They give Great, Loud ,Sound in a small EZ to pack package..And now that a new model came out, these are discounted ,if you can find them...Highly recommended !

After searching for quite some time, my husband and I purchased this speaker as a Christmas gift for ourselves and it so glad we did!  The sound quality is incredibly clear!  We played the speaker for about 10 hours one day and then used it just about every day for about an hour a day and the battery lasted 8 days before completely dying.  Highly recommend and would definitely buy from this brand.

Bought this as a house-warming gift for my friend who just moved into a new apt on his own. We opened it & tried it out as soon as we got to his place. To be fair I thought it would be bigger than it was but honestly the sound is amazing, lows & highs so we can't complain. Giving it 5 stars because it exceeded my expectations

The sound on this was great and I enjoyed it's connectivity and features. I bought it in April of 2018 and it would hold a charge for 6-8 hours. Now it's October 2019 and I can barely get an hour of music on a full charge. I've then tried to recharge it with a USB charger battery, and that doesn't seem to work very well. I know I am past any warranty or return time limit, unfortunately. If there was a way to change out the battery that might be a useful upgrade for this unit.

When this speaker worked, I liked it quite well.  I bought this in 2017 and it worked perfectly for about 18 months.  Then I noticed that the battery life was slowly decreasing.  Eventually it would only run for about 5 minutes after being fully charged.  I contacted JBL customer service and they sent over some trouble-shooting tips, but none of them worked.  Since it was out of the warranty period they offered me a 20% off code for their website to buy a replacement.  However, I am contemplating if I want to buy another JBL and have the battery die in another 18 months again.

This speaker has great sound, but the battery life isn‚Äôt the greatest. Not 12 hours.  The only thing I don‚Äôt like about this speaker is the annoying loud sound that plays when you turn it on/off. Especially when all you‚Äôre doing is listening to calming music, when you shut it off there‚Äôs a loud sound that plays to let you know it‚Äôs shutting off. Really? Is that necessary? It‚Äôs always the same volume too, regardless of how low you‚Äôre listening to music. Other than that, good quality product.

This is the best thing I have ever bought for myself! Now I can listen to music in the bathroom when I shave my legs. Fantastic sound quality! Great Bluetooth range (I can keep my non water resistant phone out of the are fore mentioned bath area). Worth every cent! I‚Äôm a musician and I trust JBL for my big sound system, I‚Äôm so happy to find the brand‚Äôs smaller components are just as lovely. Highly recommend!

UPDATE: Does last 12 hours if not all the way up 100% volume on a bicycle out on trail. It works 12 hours inside. It works 3 hours full blast on a bike. Got caught in major downpour, left in my water bottle cage. No problems just cleaned the dust from another ride. I would like 12 hours on full blast. Can‚Äôt complain though.Original: Just a little over 3 hours of battery life on a FULL charge. How is this close to 12 hours?

Great quality and for playing music on the field during soccer practice. It could be heard to an extent from the entire field if volume is turnt all the way up. I‚Äôve dropped it and kept in inside a bag many times and it‚Äôs very durable. Perfect if you want to jam out in the shower without worrying about water damage to the speaker.

Amazing. It's way better than my old Sony Bass Boosted bluetooth speaker. It was an XB20. COMPARING THE XB20 TO THIS FLIP 4 Pshhhhhhh..... Way better. Sure the sony BB has strobe lights but it doesn't have speakers that surround most of the speaker limiting the volume output. I saw this specific speaker on youtube top 5 in budget. I highly recommend if you don't wanna spend $250 for the Bose bad boy speaker (not actual name)Anyways to summarize!

I absolutely LOVE this little speaker! I now have 3 of them!! They have fantastic sound, are small & portable (I took mine to Hawaii), great charging life, and are very durable. This is a great speaker. The Bluetooth connection is strong, I haven't lost it yet! It is compact and powerful. I returned the sony one because it was just too muffled. This on is crystal clear! I recommend this speaker! I would buy another!

I already return the vr headset and the jbl speaker both of them came in the same box so i need my refund for both item it seems to me that your employee steal this jbl speaker because both of the item were in the same box you should look at your camera this is zameer your customer

This is a awesome product. I heard one at a friend‚Äôs house and ordered this one that night.The most amazing part is that it will run 5-6 hours on a charge!  I have had several small speakers but, this one produces great Base quality.

Excellent speaker. Impressive sound and very compact. So good I purchased a second one. Easy stereo link up. Placement greatly enhances the sound. The mids are more outstanding than I anticipated. Battery life is very good. The dual bass radiators pack enough punch. Very clear at max volume. Impressed. Good price and very compact. No complaints.

2 years and it won't stay on after 5 minutes. Speaker indicates that it is fully charged and yet battery is dead. Contacted Harmon group and because it is out of warranty they gave me a 20% off coupon for the purchase of a new one. Replacing the battery Is the correct answer instead of just tossing it away.

I don't normally take the time to review the products I buy on amazon, but this little speaker delivered a lot more than I could ever have expected. I bought this speaker to use at work and home (I work in a shop that is very loud with pneumatic tools constantly being used). Sounds great, has great battery life, and is also waterproof on top of everything else and just seals the deal. I would like to see the battery life increased with the upcoming models but I really can't complain when it sounds as great as it does. I wouldn't even look at another bluetooth speaker and would recommend this to anyone that was quality sound and some durability along with it.

Awesome sound! takes the place of the old Boom Box only with much better sound, when a bunch of us are hanging out. IMO opinion, it has plenty of bass, clarity and volume. I've only briefly tested the speaker inside my home at the moment, but I was surprised by how loud this little guy can get.  I'm sure it will be more than capable and sufficient when outdoors as well. Being a JBL product, which I feel is well regarded brand,  it lives up to its reputation. I can't wait to take it out on the water and have no fear doing so.

Great speaker, especially for the price. Easy to setup and charge. For the size speaker the sound is great. I like the size too. Not too small, not to large. Compared to our sound bar speaker (which is much larger and has a subwoofer) the sound is a bit lacking but that‚Äôs to be expected.

The sound is what you'd expect from JBL, solid and full. Battery could be better, but it does allow you to charge while playing. What I personally don't really like is that it doesn't really stand well, it keeps rolling and if you place it on one of the sides, it affects the sound quality.

Wow. Bought this for a float trip last weekend (26JUL19-28JUL19) sound quality is wonderful. Had the speaker in the bottom of the canoe, no worries with water. Speaker lasted over 12 hours at volumes between 60-100% probably 70% on average. The speaker actually didn‚Äôt die, we just went to bed, so it could‚Äôve had another couple of hours. Very very happy with this purchase!

This speaker is really amazing ! Considering it's size it sure can light up a room ! It sounds much better indoors that  outside, but even outside it still manages to sound amazing. The bass on the speaker is so great, and it is to leveled out and clean, nothing sounds overpowered, its all perfectly even from the hi's to the low's. If you buy this speaker you definitely won't regret it. I've dropped this speaker so many times it's been wet and tossed around but it still is amazing quality. The only problem is that, I've dropped it over 30 times and one time I dropped it from at least 10 feet and the battery life while paired with JBL connect+ drains really fast, and whenever I play it full volume the battery dies fast, but when I first bought it , it lasted at least 5 hours full volume and like 12hours on halfish volume. I don't regret buying this product and I look forward to seeing a JBL FLiP 5!!

I would love to give this product a five star review but unfortunately my JBL charging port is broken and I can‚Äôt fully charge it. I take it camping, hikes, beach days, and music festivals.

This little JBL has the best sound of any bluetooth speaker I've purchased to date. Use it while camping a was surprised at how good it sounded. Love that it is waterproof since I live (and camp) in the rainy PNW.I would definitely recommend this speaker to anyone who likes a nice balanced sound.

I tested 3 other waterproof speakers, and this one was the smallest of the 3 and it outperformed all of them by leaps and bounds. Overall couldn't be more impressed. I use to have a bose mini, and it's better than that one and the bose isn't water proof!

I bought this because I work from home and I like playing my music while I work, it doesn‚Äôt last 12hours which makes me sad and I can‚Äôt play music while it‚Äôs charge. The volume is  pretty good and it‚Äôs a nice size but I will be looking for another one with more battery life.

Speaker works great. Took it to the beach , sat on the beach , sat the speaker on top of the yeti and it blares country music so loud. I ended up growing a mullet sitting there in the sand. 2 bald eagles flew over, screeching, and dropped a woman right in front of me. It took 2 eagles because ya know , if she ain‚Äôt 380 she ain‚Äôt a lady. She landed right on my speaker but this thing holds up. She muffled the sound a little bit but as soon as 6 of us picked her up it sounded brand new. Also waterproof , I took it out in the ocean with me and a shark grabbed me from behind. I fought him off , speaker in hand about 3 meters deep and she still works like a charm. Highly recommend

I really love the speaker, my complaint is the battery life! It only lasts about 3 hours on a full charge, listening to it with the volume all the way up. That‚Äôs very disappointing. I really want to give it 5 stars but based on that, I can‚Äôt. Other reviews and even the specs say it should last much longer but I‚Äôve tried it on 3 different occasions, each time it died.. pretty disappointing since the main reason I bought it was to take to the beach and river for the day. Maybe I got a defective one?? Idk..

This speaker sounds awesome for its size... actually sounds great for a speaker much larger. Great for travel, I carry it a lot in my saddlebags on my motorcycle. Never needed to bring the charging cable because battery life is really extraordinary for a speaker of this type. Great quality and value for your money.

I got this at Christmas time for a good price. I think engineers who fit such good sound into such a small package are genius. The sound quality is at least as good as the Wonderboom I use at work. I am not sure how durable it is since it sits on a desk and I haven‚Äôt had occasion to test it in water. Overall, I highly recommend this. It just works as promised.

This speaker is amazing! The sound quality is so good and it never loses my Bluetooth connection (within my apartment). I honestly think that the sound quality is better than my Sonos One speaker (which cost almost 2-3x more!). I would definitely recommend and buy this speaker again!

This is a useless product, You can‚Äôt listen the music as the audio quality is terrible, for the Bluetooth calls, the other people says it‚Äôs completely echoing and Noise cancellation is gimmick. I passed the return window due to lock down, else I would be returning this product.

I am so sad because I bought this speaker for my ceramic studio and after a year, it won‚Äôt stay charged for more than a minute. I am so confused what happened. I bought one of these a few years ago for my photography studio and it still works...so did I just get a bad one?

Sound quality is very good considering the size of this speaker. The amount time between recharge is extremely good. I seldom  have the volume turned up to maximum and it easily plays sixteen hours. It also recharges very quickly.  Overall I'm very satisfied with this purchase. The only thing I didn't like is the ends don't have much protection, in fact the instructions tell you not to touch or push on the ends. That's a small trade off for the sound quality and not a deal breaker.

I have owned portable speakers for years now - we love to go to the pool and to the beach with them. Many have claimed to be waterproof and all have claimed to have great sound. Most fail on one or both of those claims. I did my research and purchased this bad boy. This thing not only sounds fantastic for its purposes but is truly waterproof and incredibly easy to control. I place it by the pool and control my music with my Apple Watch. It is loud and perfect for crowded outdoor uses. It also isn‚Äôt bad to look at.

This is a good product for general use. I use it to listen to voice podcasts. Music quality using this product is good, but not great. The one negative is an annoying loud sound when powering the unit on or off. The volume of this annoying loud sound is non-adjustable.
This is a very good speaker for its cost.  I bought for my teenage son and he loves it.The sound is very good and the connectivity is excellent with apple products (can‚Äôt speak for Android).

I recently bought a flip 5 and it was stolen from me, so I decided to just go with the flip 4 because it was a bit cheaper and I really liked the color. I am not disappointed with getting the flip 4.  It‚Äôs got great sound quality and good battery life. The flip 5 was a bit better sound quality especially with the bass, but the flip 4 works great for me.

This is the best speaker I've tried so far, the price also is pretty great. I ordered (and paid more for it) in red, it came white which i HATE (and was less expensive than red), i'm disappointed with the seller for this and the shipping time; it took one month to arrive, which was not estimated at the beginning. The speaker sounds amazing, loud and clear, the battery life is also great, i charge it once or two times in a month and lasts days and days playing all types of music medium to high volume. I would definitely recommend and buy this speaker again.

Just received this little beauty a week before scheduled delivery date (gotta love Amazon)!  This little guy is a great speaker...I listen to a lot of bass heavy music (dance, edm, rap) and I'm pleasantly surprised at how it handles at the uppermost volume levels. Can't expect much bass outta such a small speaker, but it does have the radiators on either end that definitely push a little bit of air and achieve a good overall sound.  The clarity of this thing is very nice and unlike some other speakers I've heard, when the bass hits, the clarity does not suffer....gotta love that, shows great quality and that's how I measure how good a speaker is.  A sure recommend and the small size makes portability very accommodating....good job JBL!!!

I had this bad boy fully charged before I went on a roadtrip. It was put off to the side and nearly forgotten about. When I pulled it out to use weeks later it still had battery life. I was amazed. Having the great sound quality makes music and movies that much better.No complaints on this product. I‚Äôd buy it again.

Bought this for my husbands birthday....He loves it, says it is the single best present I‚Äôve ever given him, even over the iPad!  He loves the portability of it, and takes it to different areas of the house to listen to his music from his phone.  It‚Äôs got great sound, and we use it in our home gym while working out...It was a great purchase!

I absolutely loved this speaker and originally talked so high about it but only after a short time it stopped charging completely and now I can‚Äôt use it.  Tried to call the company that makes it but there customer service is closed, which is super disappointing since I would give them a try again. I would not recommend this product due to battery/charging issues, won‚Äôt even work plugged it.

Amazing product ... sounds loud but clear at same time! Only little downside is the battery life... I charge it full the night before and it runs out in like 3 hours of use, I thought it was more than that. But I assume it‚Äôs because I live in cold Minnesota and I am using this in the car/garage which are both cold

Really well constructed speaker. The Bluetooth is very stable and connects so quickly without any issues or interference. Has great sound quality and the bass is prominent compared to other Bluetooth speakers I've used which just seem to only have treble while still being loud which hurts the ears. Super loud for the size and absolutely water proof. This speaker makes me trust JBL and Harman Kardon products. This is more than what I expected from this product and I am very pleased with it. I'm considering getting a second one just because of how well it functions

I use it for work with the volume all the way up i get less than 4hrs. Thats the only reason im giving it 3 stars wish the battery life was a little better.Sound: I work in a loud environment so its more of a personal speaker for a small area that im working at the moment other wise its not the loudest speaker because it has more bass than Wounder boom speaker

This is my second JBL. The first failed after being left outside over night in the early fall (no rain, no snow, not too cold). I figured it was our fault so I bought the 4. After a year having it the speaker started making cracking noises and won‚Äôt hold a charge. The cracking even happens when it‚Äôs plugged it. If playing music while plugged in it still dies. I won‚Äôt buy another again. Spend the money on a better product that will last longer.

Purchased as a gift for my significant other as we love music and to be on the go. This waterproof speaker is great for hiking, kayaking, hanging poolside, etc. Small enough to carry or clip onto something, but have the deep rich sound of a high quality speaker. The bass is great! Stays charged for a good amount of time and love to get another and test the jbl connect+ ! Highly recommend this for almost any situation!

I will review this on my YouTube channel.My experience with the flip4 is a good one.This speaker most definitely worth it.The sound quality is as good as if not better than next level speakers.I always bought like Bose speakers and I'm glad I purchased this one,if you're looking for great sound for a little less it's a deal.

I'm VERY pleased with this speaker. It surpasses my Bose Soundlink Mini II & my Sony SR30. More volume, great undistorted bass & treble in classical, classic rock, hard rock, & blues. The Sony & Bose were acceptable but died in under a year. I am hoping to have better longevity with this JBL.

I have a couple of these types of speakers and this one is very nice. The winner is that it connects to another similar speaker. (left/right).. For around the house...by the campfire- very nice, on the pier-very nice, doing yard work - very nice... wouldn't want to carry TWO on a trip or such but very happy and would get again..

Perfect speaker for my needs. Just listening to music on go ( camping, beach , backyard events and at home.  Easy to use - great sound - compact - durable and love shade of blue.  I had this on my wishlist for two years finally just bought it myself so glad I did - so much better than listening on my phone.

My friend has a FLIP 3, I was impressed on how well it worked and sounded,  not to be outdone , i got the FLIP 4.  I did spend some time reading reviews and researching on the web.  I am very happy with this speaker. I you have a tv box with Bluetooth it is really nice .  Easy to connect.  Just turn on Bluetooth in settings,  turn it on and this will appear on the list.  Can get pretty loud, good bassI will probably get another someday soon

Outstanding 21st Century quality and value in the JBL tradition.  Couple up a pair of JBL Flip 4‚Äôs and bluetooth through an iPhone for an incredible listening experience.  Be sure and download the JBL accompanying speaker app to further enhance their broadcast capabilities.

I didn't realize how much I would use one of these until I purchased it. I use it daily at home with my smart phone‚Äã and on long trips in the car. The stereo in the car isn't that loud and this compensates for it. I have 4 different music apps, including Amazon Music that pair wonderfully. I've gone from component systems to this and am extremely happy. I cannot quantify my happiness for this product.

I purchased my JBL speaker less than 2 years ago and i take very good care of all of my things. The speaker slowly starting holding less and less of a charge until it eventually would not work unless it was plugged in.  I would think at the price you pay it should last longer than 2 years.

JBL knows what they‚Äôre doing. If you‚Äôre on the fence, pick this up! Highly recommend. Great portability/size, amazing sound and holds a charge. I haven‚Äôt tested the waterproof claims and hopefully won‚Äôt need to comment on that. Amazon offers a great price. Snap it up!

The sound was good, it worked kind of but the fact that it shuts off on its own was annoying.  I didn't realize this was a known issue until after we received and I was trying to figure out why it kept shutting off.  It may be good for playing music but streaming videos/movies/TV.. not recommended.

This is a pretty good speaker as long as you are not trying to blast music on it. It has a excellent bass which surprised me but the sound gets distorted if you have the volume of your audio source too high, otherwise it is a cool little speaker. JUL states that there is 12 hours of play but I have gotten way more than 12

I just got this speaker and it‚Äôs awesome! The sound quality blew me away. It charges up quick and you can use it while it‚Äôs plugged in which is nice. I also love the fact that you can connect it to other JBL Flip speakers. This color is true to the photo, too.
Same day delivery.  AMAZING!! we love it so far.

I bought this small model for my wife. She likes to listen to streaming music on her phone speaker. I had enough of the crappy sound and gave her this. It sounds much better. The audio quality is adequate. Nowhere near a true stereo system or set of GOOD headphones. She loves it.

I bought the Flip 4 and it was a great purchase. 1. It is really loud, especially if you pair it up with others. 2. It is a good design and not bulky. The bass is there just not too deep but what can you expect from a portable speaker. 3. It's loud really loud.I liked it so much I bough another one for my wife.

I have bought two of these and my friend has several at different sizes.  They are AWESOME and easy to link for surround sound.  Beyond that the sound quality is good for the size.  There are cheaper options out there, and I have bought them, but these are worth the added cost over no name cheap speakers.

I bought two. One for my daughter and one for me. I should have bought four. I've been playing with my Christmas present. On low volume, it has lasted for days. It sounds great turned up on high.  It has yet to die on me (battery). Rich vibrant sound. I haven't tested its water resistance but I plan on testing it on my motorcycle..

I had doubts initially due to the price but this thing is perfect for the pool! It's waterproof so no more worries for us near the pool area or even if we happen to leave it outside. One of the best things is it will also connect to another JBL so make it THAT much louder!! I have been using this speaker all summer, dropped it into the pool once for a couple minutes and still it works like the first day!
Amazing speaker. Easy hookup. Sounds fantastic. The only thing was the large drivers on teh end sure look like they need protection so I added

I bought this to take with me on my photoshoots, having great music is key to my work.  In the beginning this speaker was great.  I actually bough one for my Dad for Christmas.  However just a year into owning it now within 15 min it wounds like both bass speakers are blown and has a loud distorted pop sound on the beat.  It also lasts maybe 40 min before it dies.  I did take it to the beach when it was new and it would last for 4 hours easily.Sad to say it just doesn't hold up.

It fits in the cup holder of my golf cart,  hangs on the side of my beach cart or sits on my front porch table playing anything from the classics, to nirvana or to those OutKast from south ATL.  Will play all day,  great sound,  would give more than 5 stars if I could!

This is a decent speaker for the price, but the sound is just decent, lacks bass that would expect from a speaker like this, disappointing for a brand so well known for quality sound. Battery life is pretty good, but not exceptional, again disappointing for a speaker at this price point. Look around and try others before you commit.

I purchased this item for my fiance for Christmas this year. He is very happy with the quality of the sound and how light the speaker is for easy travel and movement from room to room when working around the house. We are excited to bring it along with us to our summer adventures this year at the pool and campgrounds we spend most of our time and wanted good loud speaker to listen to.
Bough this mid Dec 2017. Was great for a year or so, but...With less than average use, and no dropping or damage,
I got it as a gift for my mom in red and I regret it. It works really well. A little too well. Now, I wake up to very loud videos and music and I‚Äôm regretting it.I have one as well and it‚Äôs good.

Amazing sound from this little tune. Exceeds my expectations. Battery life is incredible, lasted for days on standby and easily over 10 hours of use at max volume. Gets very loud. Bass is good at low volumes, could definitely use more bass at high volumes, but that‚Äôs the limit of a tiny speaker. Totally worth the purchase

So far so good! Mids & highs are pretty comparable to the Flip 3 I have but the bass hits harder making a better complete listening experience in my opinion. The battery life seems to be drastically improved from the Flip 3 as well so as long as it holds up, I won't need to hunt for a new speaker ANYTIME SOON

Great sound!  It was very easy to set up the Bluetooth connection.  I am able to hang this from the shower head and listen to music or audio books and there has not been a single issue.  Best of all - the range is fantastic.  From one end of my house to the other without any break up.  There is signal loss with distance + no line of sight, but I take it to different rooms with-in 30 feet without any problems.

This speaker was working great until about only 3 WEEKS of using it! Started to hear crackles when I was playing music, I originally thought it was my phone. But I realized that when I put on headphones to listen to my music on my phone the sound was fine it was only after putting on the bluetooth feature to connect to the wireless JBL speaker that the sound would produce crackles...so its the speaker. I want my money back.

I really love this speaker, the bass is great. If you like to hear the bass in your music then I recommend getting this. It's really durable. I dropped it by accident and everything was fine. You can take near the pool and it will be fine as well. I usually use it at home and it's great if I'm having a few people over.

Best speaker ever. So worth the spend. Spent years going through crappy $25 Bluetooth speakers that would last a few months and never sounded truly great.JBL is the polar opposite. Great construction, feels durable.
Compared to the flip 3 the 4 has a more crisp sound and great bass for such a little speaker

I've had JBL speakers for decades and this blue-tooth compact speaker lives up to JBL reputation. This little thing delivers clear, crisp high quality sound that does not seem to come from its tiny body! Plenty of base pours out of the innovative little "woofers" at each end. This is one great speaker and battery quality/life has been excellent so far.

Well I received a dud. It won't start or power on straight out of the box. I've started a return immediately and Amazon is typically great about defective returns. But this was disappointing as I wanted to use it this holiday weekend. So in the spirit of transparency- I've ordered another one to arrive in two days. Will do another review when I receive the new one. Charging this one and there's no lights or power. Used a different cord from one included in case it was the power cord and no dice. So it's definitely the unit. I bought the black one as the blue one was backordered.UPDATE: Amazon sent me another JBL right out in the mail. Got it for the weekend and I LOVE this JBL. Sound is amazing. Waterproof is awesome. The only feature it's missing - is the ability to float. I've since bought 3 more of these.
We got one for me and my husband got one the next day.  Perfect for outdoor biking, backyard parties & can link them together/Alexa!

This thing is awesome.  Bought for a trip to Mexico originally and it was the best speaker at the pool.  Very loud, good bass and super easy to use.  I recently took it to my office to stay motivated with music during these slow covid 19 days.  People think I brought my home theatre in from down the hall.  They are shocked when they see my little speaker in the corner.  üòÅ

I bought this speaker to replace the wireless altec speaker I left in Spain with a friend.  I must say I am blown away at theSound Of this small speaker.  I have been using it in my shop where I build guitars and it is a perfect companion.  It pairs

This is our second Flip4 because my kids (adult, college-age) LOVE them.  They've been fantastic portable speakers, great volume and very good sound--the water-resistant aspect is great as well.  Just wish I could get a bulk discount because we have a large family and would love to get them for all the kids :-)

I like the Bluetooth range on this thing. The sound is loud, a little muddy on the bass,  but not majorly. You can adjust that on your device. I also like the fact that I can take it in the shower. Battery life is so so when running it on high volume. Wish I could use it in conjunction with my Bluetooth system in my truck.  Maybe I can and just haven't looked into it.

LOVE THIS SPEAKER!!! This speaker sounds amazing and can be used anywhere. It says it is waterproof but I rather not submerge it purposely to find out. Bluetooth is fast and it‚Äôs so easy to use. The family has requested this speaker for the last 2 years for the beach. We link up 3 of them and our group of 11 has music all day. The sun, heat and humidity hasn‚Äôt affected it.
