Good volume range too. Can‚Äôt say anything negative about this bad boy.

It was a lot smaller than I thought, but that made it all the better! Such a powerful sound from such a small device, so I was thoroughly impressed. Wonderful packaging, and instructions are fairly simple. I tried it out in my living room and the sound resonated through the entire house. Definitely will be using it for background music for dinner parties, and can be used for outdoor parties as well, since it is waterproof. It has a little strap that you could put around your wrist so you don't have to worry about accidentally dropping it. I wish they had a pink color, but the gray is super chic and matches any aesthetic. My sister wanted to buy her own after seeing mine. Definitely would recommend to a friend.

It‚Äôs a great little speaker with a powerful sound for how big it is. My biggest issue is that the battery will completely die on you after about 6 months of use. It will require the speaker to be completely plugged in or it won‚Äôt stay on. Very disappointed about that

I work in a manufacturing plant which is pretty loud. Its not loud enough to hear over all the power tools going at once, but is pretty loud and has great sound quality.  Im pleased. You can connect several of the speakers to work together so im actually thinking of buying a couple for parties to replace a dj, for surround sound.

Got this for my wife since she was running off with the Bluetooth conference call speaker I use in my office. This speaker really puts out the decibels and has excellent sound quality. It re-charges with a conventional cell phone charger and the included USB cable. It seems to run for several days between re-charges - she uses it for a couple hours a day.

This is the second JBL speaker I have bought! We love these little speakers. They have a great sound quality and are easy to use. We have taken them to feb beach and used on a cruise.  I would highly recommend! Let me know if you found my review helpful!

This device was easy to learn how to use, set up was quick and it pairs quickly with my iPhone 6s+. The sound is very good.  The instructions are thorough and well written and easy to understand.  It has a nice box it came in and I use it to store the speaker when not in use or when traveling. Highly recommend.

This speaker cranks out the jams.  Great sound and volume for something so small and I'm always surprised by how long the battery lasts.  This is my second one of these--I keep them at different ends of the house.  My first one has lasted 3+ years and show no signs of age.My friend has a similar size Bose speaker.  It sounds a bit better but costs far more.  The JBL is a great purchase.  Don't hesitate.

The JBL Flip 4 is a very nice bluetooth speaker. I use it almost every day while working and the battery lasts more than 10 hours. Though the louder the volume the shorter the charge. It fits nicely on the dash of my truck and the sound quality is great.
Everything was great with this product.Sound quality was excellent, it just didn't last long and broke!

I bought this speaker because I was looking to replace a low-end, four-year old Bluetooth speaker that I barely used anymore because it was starting to buzz. This time around I wanted something nicer, but I really was not into spending more than $100. I think this is probably the best quality speaker for your money available. This thing sounds simply fantastic and there's quite a bit of rumble to it for being about the size of a water bottle. I haven't submerged it in water (and probably I won't on purpose) but it definitely doesn't mind stray drops from inside the shower. I haven't had any issues with the Bluetooth connection, and after a few days of (casual) use, I haven't had to charge it yet. If you're like me and you need something quality so you don't have to be tied-in to your phone or computer (or god-forbid listen to music through your laptop speakers) this is a product a highly recommend.

This is one of the best bluetooth speakers anyone can get right now for the price. The built quality, overall sound, bass and bluetooth connectivity is top notch. The only issue I had was the battery life. I've been using this speaker for almost a year now and when I'm listening to music at full blast, it only lasts me about two hours. It was very easy to notice the difference from the first time I bought it vs now. If JBL works to master the battery life usage, I believe they could create the ultimate bluetooth speaker (s), if they already haven't yet.

This is a very rugged speaker and has been kid tested by my 15 year old, he takes it everywhere and it has held up well.Battery life is excellent, unbelievable bass from such a small speaker, and being able to link it to multiple speakers is cool

We bought this for our daughter for Christmas. She loves our and uses it to listen to her music all the time. It was very worth the money and I would buy it again for myself or as another gift. We also have the JBL clip and we love that speaker as well.

Incredible sound and the favorite of portable speakers. There isnt a beach day that does not include this speaker. For the bbqs and hangouts, this brings the party alive with the amazing performance. Really great sounding highs and bass. Constantly complimented on it

I love it, I get compliments on the sound quality every time I've used it around people. Battery lasts a decent amount of time. Bluetooth hookup was easy easy. The only downside at all is that the silver color gets so dirty so easily and kind of looks terrible. I think I'm going to have to order another one just because it looks kind of gross after it fell in the dirt while camping.
The best Bluetooth speaker on the market you won‚Äôt be sorry if you buy it. Plus the price on Amazon beats anywhere else.

Needed to replace our first generation speaker due to battery not being able to hold a charge and replacement was difficult. The Flip 4 has better sound quality and the battery lasts much longer than the first generation speaker. But alas it will still be difficult to replace the battery when the time comes......

Great product from JBLBought this speaker for its small size to take on our trip to Cancun. It sounds so amazing that I now take it to work to listen to it  One of my coworkers loved it so much he bought one as well! We link them together which works really well by the way and listen to them while we work. The battery life isn't great but lasts probably 5-6 hours with both bluetooth and linked together... We just keep them plugged up and they last all our 12+ hour shift!

Absolutely in love with this speaker. Great sound quality, love that I don‚Äôt have to panic and put it away if it starts raining outdoors. Battery seems to last forever, I‚Äôve used it for long periods of time out and about and have yet to kill the battery.

After about 2-11months of use it goes to shit! Now the one I brought lasted me for about a yr before the battery wouldn‚Äôt last for shit it wouldn't keep a charge. And the sound became distorted highly disappointed. My mother brought the same one before these problems came into play with me. And hers started the same thing in about 2 months never dropped 30% of the time outside and the rest in the house.

This is a great speaker. It sounds great, and it looks pretty sleek. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because it is quite expensive, and I had one break on me after just a few months of light use. It was good enough that I purchased another one, but I am really concerned that it just broke out of nowhere.

It's a nice size, shape and the sound really is much better than I expected.  The multi-pairing aspect is really pretty awesome.  Other reviews can state all of these in much greater detail, but the long and short of it - buy it if you need a nice long lasting portable speaker that you will enjoy.

given all the reviews, i felt confident.  this machine does not perform for me....it cuts out constantly making listening an annoyance rather than a pleasure.  does anyone have any feedback for me before i return this thing?when it works, it's perfect...it just doesn't have a lot of endurance apparently.

We have a Sonos system throughout our home, but don‚Äôt have speakers outside on our deck, so we purchased this to use. The speaker itself is solid, durable and compact. The sound for music is a nice, crisp quality and it plays at volumes to accommodate a beach visit or a decent size party of people outside. The case is great too!!

Flip 4 is a Great Product. I purchased this for travel to use on vacation. By far great sound and very lightweight. I put in my backpack so it will make it to my destination. Easy to charge and play time is all day on one charge.You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

LOVE THIS SPEAKER!! I have a Bose Soundlink that just wasn't cutting it and bought the JBL Flip 4 as a replacement. The Bose battery was already failing and just simply wasn't loud enough. The JBL is plenty loud enough and battery charges fast and is very long lasting. The JBL Flip 4 does not carry bass like the Bose but can still hold it's own.
This portable speaker works well at the beach, picnic, or any other outdoor activity because:- It's small and compact.

This is an impressive little speaker. The sound quality is really good for its size, with a surprising amount of bass. It paired quickly with my phone and connects right up as soon as I switch on the power. Battery life is also very good. Haven't tried the speaker phone feature yet, so I can't comment on that. It's compact enough to fit into a suitcase or backpack. Perfect for long weekend road trips. A winner.

I bought this speaker as a replacement for a speaker included in a video package.  The video package is for projecting images from inside a window for holiday displays.  The included speaker had a short battery life with little volume.  The JBL Flip 4 proved to be just the ticket.  Its battery life was great, lasted the entire evening with plenty left.  The volume was more than enough for people walking by to hear it plainly even though plenty of trick or treaters were yelling as they walked by.  And I didn't have the volume up to its maximum.  With its small size, I was able to hide it in a bush outside the window without being seen.  I look forward to finding more applications to use the JBL Flip 4.  A great value.

Speaker can take some wear and tear, and dust.  Great battery life.  Comes with a decently long charging cord.  Boyfriend takes this speaker with him every where he goes.  Cannot yet attest to the speaker's waterproofness as it has not yet made it into the water...  Extremely great value for what you get.  Highly recommend.

The JBL flip is the best sounding bluetooth speaker I've ever heard. I got my first one for Christmas and loved it so much I bought a second one for stereo and for more versatility. The two together is simply an amazing combo. I truly couldn't be happier with the sound, the looks, the design and the functionality. Buy two!

Let me start by saying that I just purchased this a week ago for a long weekend.  I am not the most tech savvy person but this was very easy to setup.  For years, we have been using our laptop outside for music and I decided enough was enough.  For three straight days we played this in rather hot weather in the beating sun and each day it lasted around 9 hours.  The quality of sound was great and we had no issues at all with any skipping.  I wasn't sure if it would be worth the extra money but I'm very pleased and would definitely recommend.
Bought this speaker it stopped working after an hour. Returned it bought it again in a different color just to be sure I didn't get the same one back...it also stopped working after 1 day.

While I am happy with my purchase, I am a disappointed and confused about the sound quality. Reviews I read all mentioned a lack of bass. I found this speaker very bass heavy and the mids very muddy and weak sounding. Not real sure why this is the best, when you can buy small computer speakers for this price and size that are much more accurate. Sure would be nice if they would put a simple EQ circuit in these things. Cost would be a couple of dollars or just get rid of the speaker phone/computer interface stuff.The build quality seems to be solid.Just wish it sounded better.

It looks as though it is well-made and it sounds fantastic! The only downside is that it only comes with a USB cord to charge it. I would‚Äôve preferred to have an adapter also included so I could plug it into a standard outlet instead of my computer.

Not to sound like an old man, but the sound is excellent for the size of this fella. Picked up the Camo version and it looks great, fits perfectly in my bicycle water bottle cage and puts out some amazing sound. What else can you ask for - maybe have the buttons highlighted or a different color to easily identify - not worth a Star though. Best water bottle cage speaker for the price IMHO.

The battery runs out a little fast; maybe I'm expecting too much especially because I play it for hours at a time. Either way, it's a good purchase. If you're trying to choose between this and another, I've heard that the bass is better on this than others as far as a portable speaker. From my experience, it seems to live up to that.

Liked least. Price is not 74.00 for 2 speakers it‚Äôs 2 speakers nicely boxed in one box. A little misleading but price not unreasonable Liked most- used on a large screened in lanai installed where rain can blow in, the protection offered is more than adequate also the bass not overpowering, great for relaxing calm type of sounds.

It looks great and it sounds very good for the size of the speaker. The reason I give it 3 *s is because of the recharge options.  It only comes with a USB charger for your computer. So besides the almost $100 you spend on the speaker, you have to spend extra money if you want to charge it up through an outlet. To me, it seems like that kind of thing should be included. To me, it makes me feel taken advantage of and nickel and dimed for extra money.

I dont know how but this one is a hair different than the one I got from the JBL website. The buttons are a little firm and hard to press and it doesnt connect as well in party mode as the one I previously had. But all in all am happy.

Lord knows that I love my music!! Bought two for stereo. For $100 holy hinie ! I was gonna buy jb l extreme glad I didnt.you'll love these.UPDATE. ..DON'T DROP IN WATER. WILL NOT WORK properly . mine now not at all. And company not interested in fixing it. I have to buy another one for stereo but that's ok because they are nice speakers. My dumb as s fault!

Great sound and everything, however it doesn't last long. I bought the flip 4 and it took a crap before a year. Tossed it, thinking maybe it was my fault and then got 2 of the flip 5's and both took a crap before 4 months. They make a loud screeching sound eventually while youre listening to music until it eventually one day won't turn on anymore... or even charge.

I ordered this for my husband for christmas of 2017. It gets used all the time. In the kitchen, in the basement while he's working on projects, in the office. Everywhere.The speaker quality is lovely. Its not going to wow any audiophiles but its very enjoyable, and has a well balanced sound.

The best product out there for the money. You wont be disappointed. I wanted something to use for my podcasts and music while I'm in my pool and this is perfect. Took it on the boat and had sound for 6+ hrs. I haven't tested the battery limits yet but it seems like it lasts for days on high volume. Its durable and the handle it comes with makes it easy to carry around. Teal color is really nice. I was going to get the Flip3 but for a few more dollars you get the ability to submerse it under water (just an insurance for me) and if you want to get another one you will be able to connect  them to amplify the sound. (Which I assume is especially helpful for siblings or best friends. I will eventually have a few around the house for when I'm deep cleaning different parts of the house and want seamless sound.) Note: this has the Connect + Plus feature and not the Connect feature as their earlier and other models. As of this time it can only connect to other Flip4s.  10/10 would recommend.

This speaker looks and sounds amazing! It is just the right size and the battery life is fantastic. I love that it is waterproof and durable because it gives peace of mind during our outdoor activities. It arrived just in time for our camping trip, everyone raved about the speaker and asked what kind it was/where to buy one. The only reason I gave it 4 stores is because I wish there was a button to skip a song on the actual speaker. It's not a huge deal or a deal breaker though. I can skip songs and change volume from my Fitbit or phone so it is still manageable but I would love to have that feature in a future model.

This is a great little speaker. Sounds good and is super portable. However, I've already started having issues with the port to where you attach the charger cable. You have to really hold it in place with a bit of force and have it rest just so otherwise it stops charging. Going to replace the provided charging cable and hope that solves the problem

I'm an audiophile myself where quality matters and I was a bit impressed by the size of the speaker and the quality it had. There's definitely slight boost on those around 100 to 150 hertz freq and it just drops off after that but really nice auto eq for what the speaker excells in which are distinct mids and clear highs.

Title says water proof but I got the thing wet while working a couple weeks ago and there's been a decline in battery life since then. Yesterday it kept going in and out of connection, crackled, and turned off. It won't keep a charge past 1 dot blinking, 1 full and couldn't charge while playing. It was great until it got wet, so I'm curious if it's actually waterproof...

Have been using the speaker for about 3 weeks now and it is great. Sound quality is impressive for such a small speaker. And the shape is ideal, similar to the size of a soda can, allowing it to fit well in cup holders. Very happy with this product. And the battery last a long time as well.

This is a great little speaker.  It really pumps out the tunes. I bought it primarily to use on my bike, but have used it in the house, on our boat, and on our kayak. Highly recommend, especially if you bike in groups. You can all get a Flip 4 and sync then up.

The sound of this speaker is distorted when raised above maybe 30% volume.  I read reviews that mainly addressed the charging problems which I oftentimes think is luck of the draw. The majority of reviews were positive, however, my experience is one where the sound was distorted with a lot of static right out of the box. I am not even sure how to proceed. Do I return it and roll the dice on another one or search for an entirely different product?  I am open to suggestions.

I have one of these speakers.  I use it in my classroom to play music for my students.  I just bought my husband one for his birthday.  He insisted on this speaker not only for its remarkable sound, but for it's size.  His buddy had one and brought it everywhere because it fits in cup holders!  Something to think about :) - car, golf course (cart), boat, PWC, etc!  -and waterproof?!  This speaker is a no brainer.  Get it!
Surprisingly loud and has good sound.  I'm using this on my motorcycle and it's good up until 60 mph or so.

Loving this little speaker so far! Good size, tough in the elements, and fits in my bike's bottle cage!! Took it to the beach and really liked being able to connect two phones at a time so we could take turns picking songs. The battery was also great and it lasted the entire day! Could use a little more bass, but I'm not complaining given the small size. I would definitely recommend and may even buy a second one!

After reading reviews of various portable speakers, this one seemed consistently positive. I have to agree with them. I was impressed with the sound quality. The clarity and bass. I bought it only to view movies on my tablet. The on and off sound effect is "a little weird."  I haven't tested it outdoors, but it's definitely worth the purchase.

I own two of these and they sound really good. My own fault for not testing the stereo wire feature, they 100% of the time cut out on both speakers tested separately. This is flawed, I do not use Bluetooth and expected this to at least work with a stereo cable.Cons

JBL-4 has an amazing sound . I bought one 3 years ago, and tried changing the battery disastrously.  The cost of new JBL-4s through this vendor was more reasonable compared to Target, Walmart and Best Buy!  I‚Äôm  so content with this model that I don‚Äôt really need to spend extra bucks to get the latest ;  I did , however buy two of the JBL-4s ; one for me to play in my backyard and one for my teenage music -loving son .  I don‚Äôt like to share !

I had an older model of this speaker that I just loved. The problem was my wife loved it also. Guess what, I lost. I ordered this newer model and while it won't link to the older one I am still quite happy with the sound quality and the range of separation from the device and the speaker. Would recommend this.

These speakers are awesome. The sound is loud and clear. You can create a whole home surround sound out of these if you desire.  I purchased two after almost buying Bose and they did not disappoint.  They paired up nicely to my s7 and the jbl app was very easy to use. I have a feeling I will be buying a couple more to put in other rooms in our house. Buy them you will not be let down .

I'm not surprised that this thing isn't keeping up to what is really advertised. It's supposed to be durable but yet out of the times I had accidentally dropped it, it seemed to damage the integrity of the charge. Everytime I charge it for a reasonable time, it acts as if it doesn't have much charge when I put it to charge. Like what gives? Why trust the Chinese for parts? You should know how they are with their manufacturing practices.

What an awesome and powerful little speaker. Fully recommended, even over the Charge 3. Both the clarity and bass are on point. The louder you play the music, the better it sounds with no distortion ever. I bring this thing everywhere with me and people love it. Even at the beach, with wide open space and ambient noise around, it explodes with sound and you can clearly hear and "feel" the bass. Way cool. Thanks Jbl!

This was my first JBL Portable Speaker. I really like it and have been enjoying it very much. The sound is great for where I work...Airplane Maintenance Facility. So it is loud enough to hear above all the other noise going on. Battery is really good I charge it over night and last for my 8 to 10 hour shift. Great product highly recommend.

Great speaker. I had been wanting it for a long time and didn‚Äôt want to spend that much. Prime day came around and I couldn‚Äôt pass it up. I‚Äôm very happy with the sound quality and by the volume. We use it outside around our pool and we can hear it crisp and clear.

This is a nice little speaker for the most part - decent battery, sound quality, etc.However, it's not even 2 years old and it just constantly turns off. Battery is charged, bluetooth connection is fine, but it'll shut off randomly during a song. It's incredibly annoying.

This is perfect for my room in my shared apartment. I can use it in my room while I do work or I can move it into the living room when we have friends over- the sound quality is just as good at high or low volume. One of my roommates liked it so much that he got the same one in blue. A high quality speaker for an awesome price.

I Love the sound quality, i wish it went up higher actually, but I'm nuts so. It's a bit annoying connecting the bluetooth, switching between 3 devices but it connects quickly. The battery life is insanely great, I wonder how long that will last.... It's dope, I like it, I want to see how it does in a steamy bathroom and what not and really test it out but so far so good.

after watching many YouTube videos I decided to go ahead and purchase this little speaker and I‚Äôm really happy I did, the sound quality is incredible the battery life is good for what I use it for which is mainly for workouts and I only workout for about an hour so it‚Äôs not problem for me I also use it while playing video games to listen to music or YouTube videos but I can easily charge it from my pa4 in case the battery is low in conclusion I‚Äôm happy with my purchase and I think this is a great product.

I've had this for a year now. It stands up to a lot of tests. It's loud, durable, weatherproof, but most importantly, the sound quality hasn't degraded over time from frequent loud usage. I know many people who have this, as well. Great speaker! Long battery, too.

Sounds great for small speaker. Cool feature allows to "link" to other units for broadcast of music. Charged up fast. Great buy. Easy to use. Bluetoothed with my phone no problem. Pause/play on device. Bought waterproof case for it.

Bought this last July. It's decent, but not actually that loud. Main issue is the fact that, after semi-infrequent use over the last 10-ish months, it simply stopped working. I had it in a backpack, and had been using it roughly every day for about 4 days, and, after pulling it out to charge that weekend, it would not do so, nor would it turn on. It's never been dropped significantly, to my knowledge. It hasn't had contact with water in weeks. As I said, it's only 10 months old and was not used heavily. It worked just fine up until it didn‚Äôt at all. Buy if you plan to have a nice soundin, sleek, waterproof speaker for under a year, andrun useless piece of rubber afterwards.

Absolutely love my JBL speaker! The sound is so clear! And there so much power behind this little speaker LOL I would highly recommend anybody purchase a JBL! Perfect Bass! Long lasting battery! And my favorite color is turquoise so I absolutely love coloring LOL are you clumbsy like me? If you drop it? It definitely has protection so it doesn't shatter LOL it can definitely take some wear and tear!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND

What can I say, you get what you pay for . The quality and sounds from this speaker is second to none . I have a Bose portable speaker which is great but the battery life sucks . This on the other hand last very very long . Easy to pair with any device also.If I have the I will buy this again.

I've used this speaker multiple times and haven't needed to charge it. Sound is great.  We used it for my daughter's softball team warmups and everyone could hear clearly.  I love the size fits into any bag I need.  Would recommend for sure

The speakers only worked for about 6 months and it just stopped! it stopped connecting, no sound, no charge, NOTHING!  A few months before it stopped , Bluetooth connection would just randomly disconnect while being used and id have to shut it off to restart the device. Even when plugged to a charging source! I loved the color of the speaker ( teal), the sound was very average ( lots of noise). It had such great reviews, but my experience was very disappointing. Definitely didn't get my moneys worth! :(

I would not recommend this product to anyone!! I bought this product for a gift  Once the gift was received 2 months later  it would not hold a charge and I am unable to return the product due to the time limit. Very disappointed.

I purchased two of them to use in the backyard around the pool. But they are supposed to connect to each other via their own Bluetooth. But they don‚Äôt and even sitting next to each other there is so much static I have to turn one off.

Lacks Volume! Nice little speaker but if you want to rock the house, this is not the speaker for you. I bought it to put in noisy jeep to listen to music, volume loud enough to hear but not loud enough to overcome wind and engine noise

I currently own 4 and will probably stick with JBL speakers in the future. My family enjoys them and I haven‚Äôt had any issues with this brand. Trust me we have gone through speakers from them not taking charge to just not working, those were other brands.

Worked great for the first few months, then it wasn't able to play for more than 10 minutes without needing to be plugged in. It takes ages to reach full charge and dies within minutes. Now, it can't play at all without being permanently plugged in. So much for being a portable speaker. Naturally I can't take this anywhere now, really let me down here.

Ordered by my husband. We take this speaker almost everywhere when traveling. Puts out great sound, I typically have to tel him to turn it down. Used at the beach on a day with rain showers, the speaker never got ‚Äúsoaked‚Äù but certainly wet due to wind and had no issues. Great carrying/storage case.

Teen son loves it. Has used it only indoors so far but is able to play clear sound from his projector that is like surround in the condo. I also got him the carrying case which he loves and plans to take on trips or to the field when he plays catch. Got this on Black Friday deal, worth it.

The Flip sounds great for a speaker in this price point.  I bought 2, I occasionally sync and play both via Bluetooth.  The speakers need to be fairly close to each other to be synced.  Great travel speaker or for everyday use.

100% authentic,sounds great, bass is great too. Took a bit longer to arrive but thats no big deal. Had it for 3 months now and i use it in the pools and sometimes in the shower. It has gotten wet many times and has fell on the floor so many times and is still working like its new

The sound quality is good, and I have had no problems with the mic cutting out on Zoom calls. HOWEVER, the entire thing will shut itself off. No warning, just disconnects. This is not useful in the middle of a webinar or longer call! While it helps to keep the unit plugged in (I can get 45 to an hour), it does not totally solve the problem. The result is that I must stop the webinar I am leading and reconnect which makes me look rather incompetent.

Love this speaker so far.  Great sound, and a perfect balance between volume and size.  Good battery life.  Don't have to worry about covering it quick if it starts raining.  I need to find a better way to stick it in a bottle holder on my bike.  Zip tied to the frame at the moment, which works great, but a little bit of a hassle to remove to recharge or to use it elsewhere.

Having owned the Flip 3 and praised both its sound and value.  I have the same praise for the Flip 4 except even more so.  The sound feels more controlled and clear than its predecessor, the battery life increased, and there have been numerous small but thoughtful improvements to the design.  Highly recommended.

this speaker is very well made and connects quickly to your device via bluetooth. I mean instantly....it has plenty of volume for use in rooms, like a bedroom or bathroom. I have not taken it outside yet to try it. The sound quality is great for a subwoofer but there's no pitch... no highs in the sound... it almost sounds a little drowned out.. not sure.... anyway.... I enjoy the speaker and would recommend it....

I was on my brother in laws boat and he was playing music from this JBL Flip 4 and I thought this had the best sound I've heard in such a small unit. It has strong but clear lows with smooth highs that are not too tinny. I would put this up against Bose any day and it's much less than the Bose. I love it, and it's waterproof....

Una vez mas, JBL me queda mal con la bater√≠a y cargador de esta flip 4,,,  compr√© la flip 4 porque me di√≥ ese mismo problema la flip 2 que ten√≠a.... a los 2 a√±os ya no cargan, se agota la bater√≠a, se arruina el conector y ya no te cubre la garant√≠a... tendr√© que comprar Bose ahora en adelante, l√°stima porque s√≠ tienen buen sonido

i like this product i have been using it for over 6 months, the white one kinda gets a little bit dirty otherwise this is a product for one room use. I gave it four stars coz I think it's overhyped appearing as a cheaper alternative to the Charge 4. I think if you want to cover more than two rooms with good bass get the bigger one. enjoy the clout of JBL

This speaker performs like a champ. The Bluetooth pairs up quickly and easily. The sound quality is very good, especially for such a small unit. At night I pair it with my Google Home Nest and drift off to jazz.I am thinking of buying a second one and setting them up in a stereo configuration.

I love this thing. Got it on a sale, and if I lost it.... I would buy another one full price. Great for early morning shower tunes, working outside, beach, cookouts, you name it. Charge lasts a long time, and it has amazingly crisp sound for such a small device. And the bass is great.

I love the easy connect and sound quality that comes from this speaker. I use it in my radio only car to finally be able to blast my own music.I do a lot! If it weren't for my own finances I would love to buy another for my restroom. I need it for sound blocking my bad singing during morning/night preps.

My daughter received this speaker as a Christmas gift.  It has been everywhere with her... in the bedroom, bathroom, snow boarding in her backpack... everywhere.  It's amazing that such sound comes from such a small device! (the size of a cucumber!)  Great purchase and happy customer.

This speaker provides excellent sound for its size and I would give it 5 stars but for the really irritating sounds it makes when turned on or off and activating Bluetooth pairing. They are quite loud and obnoxious and can't be muted or even quieted; I can't imagine what their development team was thinking (there are numerous complaints on JBL's own support site about it).

The speakers are great in.a small space ... but go outside and they can't compete with the collection of outside noises. You open your eyes and realize how weak the speaker is amazing sound indoors a quiet house and one of my two speakers will not charge and Amazon requires I speak with JBL rather than process of product exchange after all JBL has a lifetime warranty and replacement of 1 to 3yrs these days. It is in the connection from the charging cord to the device.

Have been using JBL products for almost 6/7 years now and still I think they are best in class considering the quality provided at the price offered. Never had doubts about buying JBL4 speakers. Great sound, water resistant and portable. Its my 2nd JBL4 and can buy again!!

I already have one of these and I love it so I got this one as a gift for someone and she loves it. The sound quality is great and I love that it's waterproof so I don't have to worry about that. Battery lasts for a couple to several uses depending on how long you are listening.

Love this speaker so much, I even bought another to use upstairs or when I want stereo sound downstairs.  It's compact, yet the sound quality is really very good and the battery life is great so far.  We're very pleased with this product and use it almost every day.
I love the speaker it‚Äôs LOUD but it says 12 hours until it dies and I completely charged it and it only last 2.5 hours !!!! This is the 3rd time it completely died on me

Although material quality is great, and the sound is ok, it has a "feature": if your music has low intensity sections or silence, the speaker will cut out the sound completely, making you miss some sections of the music. And then, when the sound increase the loudness, the speaker will cut about 1 second of your music, missing some parts. I was very angry when I discovered that, and it will happen both via bluetooth or AUX. Just don't buy it, find a not stupid speaker. Search for "Problem with JBL Flip 4 cutting off audio after a few seconds of silence" on Youtube for a example. It is a "feature", and if its a hardware design, no firmware update will correct that.

What an amazing small speaker. It really delivers a great sound quality. Awesome at the beach, pool, grilling, boating or wherever. I replaced an Altec Lansing clip on and this blew it out of the water.  I've only had it play the longest for about 6 hours straight and there was still plenty of juice.
Ably serves its purpose as a portable bluetooth speaker, especially on the golf course - it fits into the cup holder on the golf cart - battery life is exceptional.

I have not had my Flip for very long but so far so good. It is a high quality electronic from the packaging to the unit. The loudness and quality of sound are very good considering the size product. The only improvement I can think of is that it doesn‚Äôt come with a carrying case, I had to purchase one separate and this is why I held one star.

I admit, I'm old.  My stereo speakers from decades back come up to my hip.  That this tiny thing can produce such sound truly amazes me.  It's much better than the sound bar we have for our TV, more crystalline high notes, less muddiness.I've put three stars on the battery because I don't know on that yet.

I have used it twice now for beach days. It lasts hours on full blast and is loud. Only thing is after a while it starts to disconnect its self from bluetooth. Not sure if that's from being in the sun. But it's totally worth the buy.

I've had this well over a year, still works the same, very nice speaker, has a nice sound and weight to it. The bass is lacking a little bit, but I definitely recommend this, it's the best portable speaker I've purchased. The battery life is pretty bad though, it won't last you more than an hour or two on full volume. The sound fills up a car perfectly, and if outside, the sound carries quite nicely.  I have not tested the waterproofing or durability of the speaker, as I don't have money to throw around.

It stopped working 2 weeks ago, that's 2 weeks after the return period ended. I try connecting it to PC with cable or Bluetooth, and the sound brakes every 5sec, and when I try connecting it with my iPhone through Bluetooth the same. But before that, the sound quality was great! I would like to give it a second chance and exchange it, so please get back to me. I really liked it while it was working!

I purchased this a month ago, used maybe a handful of times I was initially happy with the purchase, great sound but now it won‚Äôt charge.  I expect a new product not to malfunction with such little use.  Very frustrated...have spent hours online trying to troubleshoot.  Nothing has been helpful.  Wouldn‚Äôt recommend.  Now who knows how long I‚Äôll have to be with tech support on the phone to figure this out or just cut my losses and purchase a new one by another company.

My previous JBL 4 year old speaker was damaged by water. I replaced it with a flip 4, and I‚Äôve been pleasantly surprised by how much the sound quality has improved since my original purchase, and it is waterproof!  I had my old plug-in charger and case that fit the new flip 4 which is helpful. I would‚Äôve been disappointed if I brought a speaker without a protective case and durable wall charge cord; but that‚Äôs how they are keeping cost lower.

This thing is as loud as my old amplified car speaker set up.... It will literally hurt my ears if I put it up full volume in my car (which is what I primarily use it for now that my speakers no longer work). Has good punchy bass and clear vocals.

I bought this to use on deck and patio for evening dinners. It is durable and produces the best sound! No more need for speakers and wires. This connects perfectly with the cell phone and streams music, phone calls, or anything that you could hear from your cell phone. Worth the purchase!

This is actually the second speaker we have purchased.  The first one has worked beautifully for the last year and the sound quality is fantastic so we purchased a second one because you can link them.  Now we can go back and forth between the inside of the house to the backyard and have continuous music playing.

We are in love with this speaker. We were instructed not to touch the smaller ends. I‚Äôm not sure I would have figured that out myself. The bass emits from the ends and those parts are a bit fragile. Otherwise, I‚Äôm in love. It‚Äôs loud. Rich. And portable. What else do you want for $100?

Bought for my husband as a Father‚Äôs Day gift. He recently traveled with it and I‚Äôm convinced he absolutely loves it. The sound is amazing. Great purchase and i bought the carrier to allow him to store it properly and make easy for packing for travel.

Has decent sound, but i think my soundbudslife bluetooth headphones have better sound quality overall. I use it on a lower volume mostly for that reason. I like to use it for movies, has "theatre quality sound" mostly meaning it sounds good with low bass and sounds that are crowded together. Overall i like it but the sound quality is iffy.

Great sound for the price.  More volume and low end than similar, more expensive competitors.  Battery lasts a long time. Bluetooth is a little finicky on my Flip 4, but I purchased one for my daughter, and she never has trouble connecting.  May just be this unit.

I had been looking for a small portable speaker for quite awhile. While there are hundreds of these types of speakers out there, most of them sound flat and lifeless. Not this bad boy! The sound is super loud for a speaker of its size, and the sound is as rich and full as can be expected from something this size. The fact that it‚Äôs warerproof made this purchase a no-brainer. One of the best features is the little jingle it plays upon getting powered on ü§ó

I bought this for my friend at work and she loves it.  The red is just her color and she was so impressed with the sound quality.  A good gift for anyone in your family who just absolutely needs music in their life! Waterproof, stylish, portable! The battery life is a good 3-5 hours on full blast steady streaming via Bluetooth‚Äã! That's amazing!

PAY THE LITTLE BIT EXTRA FOR THE PROTECTION PLAN. I don't usually do reviews but the reviews helped me purchase this item. I would have given a 5 start if mine stayed working. It worked fine when I got it and I loved it!. It sat unused for the winter. the other day turned it on. It came on but the Bluetooth would not connect. I gooled it and it seems that happens a lot with these. But what they said to do didn't work. Then It would not come on unless I had it connected to power. Very frustrating!!!! Well I had purchased the 4 year Asurion Protection plan for around 11.00 and It was one of the easiest things I had ever done. They are sending me stuff to send it back and giving me a full refund.

Simply the best-est in the category. Swesom Awesome product, sound quality exceptional. I play siriusxm or amazon music both in HD quality and experience is out of this world. Make sure your content is high quality for best experience.Do not think twice buting it. Just go for it.

Perfect speaker. Every other speaker claims crystal clear sound or good base is nothing like this one.  I have returned soudcore 1 and Oontz as I was not happy with sound and got JBL that was amazing but to be honest it is triple price of the other first generation speakers that I returned. Overall happy and satisfied with JBL.

I love this speaker, I am planning to get a new one. The sound is very nice, you wouldn't think it is so loud due to the size. I take it everywhere, it is easy to carry around. One day I made the mistake of leaving it on the lawn in the backyard after a BBQ get together, then my sweet, sweet boxer decided it was her toy. I found the speaker next morning all dirty, chewed on, decided to turn it on and amazingly it works perfectly. Not sure if it is still water resistant and not planning to find out.

Incredible Sound! Better than I ever expected. I was expecting something that would play music, but not much more. Based on other reviews, I purchased this one. It connects with no difficulty, and the sound is unbelievable. I'm considering buying another, because it can connect with other JBL speakers. The only thing I don't like is that it comes with a USB cable only - not a wall charger.

Gave it as a gift to my Bf and he loves it. He works outside and when it started raining the speaker was fine and still played well. We take it with us biking and the sound quality is amazing when we are going through crowds. It's also small and light weight so easy to take with you anywhere. Such a great gift for someone or yourself.

This the second JBL Flip 4 speaker that I have purchase. We purchased the second on to sync them together for a surround sound while we are outside. We took the first one on a camping trip and attached the speaker to our river tubes. The speaker got wet and did submerge but continued to blast out our tunes! It was a great purchase.

The first feature here says "Wirelessly connect up to 2 smartphones or tablets to the speaker and take turns playing impressive stereo sound"; but the speaker struggles to connect to two devices. It successfully made me look like a fool in couple of meetings where I tried to speak through this speaker and the microphone wasn't connected. And why was it not connected! only the speaker knows why. Those two stars I gave is for the quality of sound.

This was a gift to myself and I love it. The sound is absolutely amazing and I used it without even charging it and to have not been charged up, used straight out the box I will say I got a solid 6 hours out of it! It not only showed up when the seller said it would, it came earlier in the day. Thanks!! I would purchase again =)

This is the second Flip4 I bought. The JBL app that allows party mode allows you to link multiple speakers to play from one bluetooth device. Waterproof makes it perfect to use anywhere, for example my boat, or outdoors camping.

I don't normally write reviews, but I was so blown away by the clear sound of this JBL Flip 4 speaker that I had to rate it 5 stars.  Not only does this speaker sound MUCH better than any other bluetooth speaker I've used before, it also is MUCH louder.  I couldn't believe how loud this speaker could get, while maintaining a full, clear sound.  I'm thinking of buying another speaker to put in a different part of my house.  Very impressed with this speaker.

Jbl for the price makes great speakers. I own the flip 4, flip 2 and the charge+. I bought this one for my wife. It has great sound. Very good range on the Bluetooth. Loud enough for outside. I do think these speakers work best inside. In the kitchen cooking or bathroom while getting ready. They sound amazing
I use this speaker mostly at home around the kitchen but have taken to hotels when traveling with my wife. Love it's mobility and sound. I can listen to my exact choice when and where I like.
Bought this to use with another larger JBL speaker, the Extreme but that is the old JBL Connect technology and this with the new JBL Connect + will not link to it.

This is a great little speaker. I have been super impressed with the battery life and sound quality since it is so small. It is pretty ‚Äúrough and tough‚Äù and has held up being on the boat, on bikes, and tossed in hiking bags. The only downfall is that the connection can be weak in our brick home from room to room, but it easily connects to our turntable and other electronics.

So glad I purchased this.  The battery life is awesome, but even better is the sound that comes out of this thing.  I need to get another one so that I can sync them in tandem and have stereo sound while in a hotel room or out on the back patio.  Amazing!!!!
Got this for my husband as a gift. LOVES it! The sound quality is awesome. We put it in the center of our 1170 square foot apartment and could hear the music throughout..great purchase.

This speaker seemed to work really well for the first six months. It completely stopped working and began to glitch. Not sure what happened, but it sure isn‚Äôt worth the price for the short time it lasted.

I've heard better sound from Sony speakers but when it comes to durability and overall experience this beats every speaker in its class! It has fallen and tumbled so many times and it's still alive and kicking!

Mom did good!  Bought one for each son for their birthday.  One of them likes it so much he uses this instead of his car speakers.  They like that they can hook up more than one and drive me crazy with their music.  I may need to not be so good at buying presents.

Got this speaker originally to use at work, but I bring it everywhere with me now! We have property on a lake and this comes to the lake with us every weekend. We use it on the boat, at camp, at home and at work. A very versatile and handy speaker!

I work at nights in isolated areas and freezing temps. Bumping to my music helps me to keep warm. The sound coming out this thing is crystal clear and you can almost feel the base. Just wish it had a clip or something to help attach it to areas that aren't always flat. Battery last all night (7hs) and it's small enough to throw in a suitcase to take on vacation to enjoy your music wherever you go.

I bought 2 these a little over a year ago and one of the speakers is starting to fail. It plays for a few minutes and then begins to crackle and then goes dead. I‚Äôm guessing it had a 1 year warranty. For a hundred bucks it should have lasted longer.

It's a good size to carry around and the sound is rich and just enough bass. Not sure that I need waterproof, but it's nice to know that it is. My son has the charge 3 but I wanted something a bit smaller. This has less bass than the charge 3 but still a nice balanced sound. I wish I could turn off the startup and shutdown sounds, but that's a minor nitpick. Comes with a cord so you can hang it, or it can be placed horizontal or on it's end but I think it sounds best horizontally. I compared with UE, Sony, etc. but I'm happy with this choice.

I got tired of buying those cheap speakers that would go dead every hour. I really like this speaker. It has great sound quality and the speaker itself is very durable and it connects to my IPhone XS Max very fast.

I bought it 2 months ago and I use it almost everyday. It's totally loud enough for parties but quiet enough for when you want to sleep with music playing. Also useful for showers because it's waterproof. Its bass is amazing, as well as sound quality. The size is perfect to fit in any bag and even to carry it in your hand (because it has a tiny strap connected to it).

Sounds great. Full range of sound. Can easily up the bass depending on what you place next to it. Super fun for shower. Love that the volume control buttons are so easy to find and feel.  Husband got it for me for Christmas but it would make a great gift for a Teen.

I got this as "Refurbished" but the battery die after a couple of months, can't even replace the batter cuz some idiots at the design team decided it best to Glue the factory battery to the unit, making it impossible to remove the factory battery when it dies.

Bought this for my husband who likes his music LOUD and CLEAR, this is the ONE is perfect for that.  My husband loves it and has thanked me many times, telling me that I finally bought him a REAL GOOD speaker (I've bought other ones in the past) If you are looking for a LOUD ONE buy this one...It's also very clear and cute!

NEVER give 5 star reviews. I had to for this new speaker from JBL. Amazing battery life at 12 hours. Sleek design almost mimicking the Beats Pill, but in my opinion way better looking. The Bluetooth range is insane I can go across my yard with my phone in my pocket which is like 70-80 ft from where I place the speaker and it doesn't lose connection. scoop one up before they're all gone.

This is one of the best purchases I‚Äôve ever made. The sound is awesome. I take it with me to the pool, I‚Äôve taken it on trips. I use it everywhere. It‚Äôs absolutely waterproof‚Äî I‚Äôve dropped it into the pool more than once. It can get covered in suntan lotion and cherry limeade and still work.

super nice speaker actually really like it.  The only thing i wish is that i did my research and bought one with 360 sound.  That's not the speakers fault though.  The sound is explosive, I bought it in red and the red is beautiful, also the cord is really high quality for charging wish it came with an aux.  Would highly recommend this product.
Ridiculously loud & clear sound from such a small unit.Love the camo coloring.

Oh right, that old dinosaur of a Bose speaker... This JBL is all that and more. Love these things. They sound great, have a cloth handle attached for carrying, super light weight, durable - never has a connectivity problem. I plan to get 2 more!

Love these speakers. I got two and will someday add more. They link together and can make for a very inexpensive whole house sound system. Want more volume? Add more devices. Bass is decent, but not super thumpy - size of space make a difference. In the bathroom, bass seems stronger, outside not so much. I plan to buy more.

We bought this for my preteen son who loves listening to music in the shower. So far, he's dropped it twice and accidentally kicked it off the couch once, and it still functions beautifully! It's proven to be very waterproof and sound quality is great, even in a tiled shower.

The perfect portable speaker! I use this to teach an outdoor workout class and it projects really well. I do wish the battery life was just a bit better, but I can usually get away with using it a few days before having to charge it. I like the red color so I can easily see where I placed it and be sure I don't leave it behind anywhere. It's a great price, too!

Love it! At some Wal-Mart stores they have these set up to try out... This Flip 4 is just as loud as the Charge 3 it seems, I mean, almost exactly the same loudness!  Regarding sound quality, it sounds absolutley fantastic and way better than the JBL CHarge 3. The CHarge 3 is muffled compared to this. Anyway, if you like LOUD, this thing gets pretty dang loud for a small room. Blah blah blah, buy it

I'm not an audiophile, but this speaker is really impressive.  The bass is low and the treble isn't too tinny on this speaker.  I love that it's waterproof (I keep mine in my shower usually) and the battery life is pretty good (generally charge once a week).  The color is nice too!

Love this speaker. I already have one for myself and ended up buying another for a gift. You can completely submerge the speaker in water and it still works... great for outdoor summer activities. Puts out great sound and is half the price of Bose speakers. Highly recommend.

I got this to pair with my blue flip 4 and black charge 3. I absolutely enjoy this speaker. It goes everywhere with me, bike rides, work, gardening. You dont need to blast it cause theyre pretty strong. I just got a seat post rack on my beach cruiser for the charge 3, but may bump it off for the xtreme 2. 20000 mah power bank, and you got music for hrs and hrs.Pro tip, charge your speakers at half battery or sooner just to extend the battery life.

The title says it all.. It has a pretty good sound but it‚Äôs not like loud!! I mean I use it throughout the house but I know it wouldn‚Äôt be loud enough of the beach or a kickback.. and I literally have to charge it everyday. The battery life last maybe 3 hours tops for me. I might have a defective one idk...

So glad I bought this !! I was still using the old cassette adapter connected to my phone in my work machine. I got tired of it jamming up or just crappy audio so I found this thing. What a difference !!! The sound is crystal clear and well balanced plus the battery lasts for well over 12 hours even cranked up !

The sound quality is really great, but if listening at high volume the battery doesn't last anywhere close to 12hrs. Kinda disappointed with how quickly the battery runs down. 2 maybe 3 hrs of run time is all than can be expected from my jbl flip 4 speaker.  Personally from experiencing both products if was shopping for another speaker, id definitely reccomend the ultimate ears boom line of speakers over jbl.

wasnt expecting such good sound quality out of a little speaker. great highs and lows and super clear. Boat this to use on my sailboat and can hear it perfect while its in the cabin. Paired up easily to my phone and ipad and i love the buttons on the top. You can submerge this speaker under water and it keeps playing like normal, also feels very rigid. over all just a really good well rounded speaker

update: manufacturer warranty covered with no questions.I got this thinking it would last as it's really durable and waterproof. Two months later I go to use it  and no sounds works. I can pair the device change the volume on the speaker up see it change on my phone, play, pause; you get it's connected. There is enough battery even the sound on turning it on makes a small chirp other than the normal sound it does. This thing sat around and then didn't work when we wanted it to.
Nice little speaker with nice sound for its size.The only downside to it (and I knew this before buying it) the FLIP 4 does NOT FLOAT! So be careful out on the lakes, rivers, etc.

I bought more than one and the conectivity between them as with the bluetooth is prety good. The sound quality is very decent and the battery life is as advertise. The two I have serve me good for ambient music hosting birthdays and parties in my patio.

We used this speaker all summer at the beach. It get wet, buried in the sand, and dropped a few times. Still works great! Really like the durability, sound, and convenient size. This little package packs a punch! Highly recommend!
Just two yrs old and battery won't hold a charge. Was happy w it until now. Well taken care of I might add.

I debated heavily between the Flip 4 and the Charge 3. Flip 4 still has enough bass for everyday use and I decided I can add the more bassier Charge 3 at any time and pair them for events or just when I'm in the mood. How simple a decision once I thought of it!

I must say I am impressed, the sound is well balanced without the lows overpowering the highs. The battery is great and plays all day and I charge the speaker untill I go back home and I am happy with my purchase and definitely I will buy again. Kudos to JBL and Harman & Cardon for great product and to finalize my humble review. "Amazon Rocks"

My spkr stopped working abt a mo. ago. Cannot get it to connect at all. Tried everything. Also it may not be charging but cannot tell bc it won't connect plugged in or not. Very disappointing. I paid up for JBL quality but got dinged. Wish it were not so.

It's super nice and loud and overall great. If you're on long desert journey's though, expect to charge it a few more times than you'd really want to, but I don't think any of these exist where that isn't true.

I love this little Speaker!!! Music sounds Great!!! Battery life Great! It lasted over 8hrs at Max Volume! More than what I expected. Great for the beach,hikes,pool side,bike rides, picnics, at the park. And its really great in the bathroom! But where it does lack is the mic when using it to have conversations over your phone. Not so Great.
It‚Äôs so easy to use, and the sound quality is fantastic!  I can charge it up and take with me for a long day of fun listening (as a caregiver for the elderly, nice to find a songlist they enjoy)

I purchased 2 JBL Flip 4 speakers....they paired very easily and I get to listen to music outside anywhere!!! You just move them where you want them...No wires, no electrical plug in!!!! Awesome!!!! Anywhere!!!
It is an awesome and very powerful little wireless Bluetooth speaker and awesome sound and a ton of bass to it i will buy another 1 soon to link up to it i am also looking to get the jbl flip 5

This came very fast two days stoked about that thank you! It came fully charged so I was able to blast my music while I worked today. This speaker is smaller but just as loud if not louder than the JBL3 older model. The volume of sound doesn't distort the music like most other small speakers do. I'm very happy with the JBL4 great speaker that I would purchase again!

This is a decent speaker, I don‚Äôt really have much to compare it to. I use it at home, at the gym and sometimes outside. It gets pretty loud but I have rarely ever turned it all the way up.The sound is good and battery life as well. I haven‚Äôt had any problems with connectivity. This thing is pretty sturdy and has been dropped or fallen from a pretty good distance.

I wish I had purchased one sooner! The sound quality is great, the battery last quite a while, and the color is gorgeous! I love that it‚Äôs waterproof so I can have it with me when I‚Äôm doing laps in the pool!

This product is out of Warranty  and I have reached out to the JBL customer service and they are unwilling toreplace it. I would not recommend buying this speaker. We didn't take it out of the house and used it very little before it stopped working. This speaker is waterproof and leads you to believe it is made to withstand the elements. HOWEVER for us It didn't last and the company did nothing but offer me coupon to buy more of poor products. NO THANKS I will take my business elsewhere, buyer beware!!!

I bought it in may. About half a year after I started hearing weird noises, battery was discharging in few minutes and was disconnecting from my Bluetooth. Called customer serivice. They nicely talked to me and gave me a brand new one. I bought extra insurance from Amazon but still have no idea what its for. The insurance that I had to deal with was from JBL originally. (1 year warranty that JBL has)

I do not even have this speak a year and the battery charge lasts for about 15 minutes.  It always shows that the battery is fully charged, when it clearly is not.  The subwoofer rattles when played loud.  I have had other JBL speakers with no problems, clearly this speaker was not made well and of course it is outside the time to return or get the company to replace  the speaker.  Very disappointed customer.

I don't normally do reviews.. (only negative ones) by I'm actually astonished at how good this sounds compared to other portable speakers.We use this speaker in the kitchen and outside on the patio, typically streaming music from bbciplayer (radio 1), amazon music etc.

Love the speaker. Used to have the older version until it fell off a shelf and broke. The update is great. Sound is good and the bass quality is good for a compact speaker. The only complaint I have is that the buttons (power on/off etc.) are indented by design and aren‚Äôt the easiest to push down but that‚Äôs not a huge thing to complain about.

Absolutely love this. Great sound quality, and it‚Äôs LOUD. I get over 8 hours of battery life. Aside from light drizzles, and splashes. I haven‚Äôt tested the water resistance. But it‚Äôs still working great.

I've been using this speaker for three months now and I gotta say this is the best possible speaker money can get you at this price range.  Whenever I'm out and I wanna play my music I can tell you for sure you will get annoyed looks towards your way.For a decent sized room it's rather loud in public for example let's say you're walking you can hear the music at full volume (I can't guarantee this due to the fact that I haven't tried that yet also how loud the music or whatever you're playing from the speaker depends on how loud the device that's connected to the speaker is.)

This has some great sound. The bass drops off at about 50hz but that‚Äôs great for this size. The passive radiators allow great sound but they are a week point so if you plan to be rough then go with something totally enclosed.

I have bought three of these in different colors as gifts for our adult children.  They love them!  The sound quality is great and having the option to choose different colors for your personality or decor is a plus!
While it sounds great, odds are you will have to use it plugged in since the battery life is barely 2-3 hrs after a couple of months

This is a great speaker for the price. I love that I can have it in humid climates (including the shower) without the risk of damaging it (though purposefully putting it in and underwater is NOT suggested). It sounds great. I use it for about an hour a day and charge it about once a week. Love it.
Just what my daughter wanted and she loves it the sound is great and she loves the bass

Super nice and high quality speaker. My only thing for me is that it‚Äôs a lot smaller than the previous JBL version but the sound quality is as good but it was for my daughter, who wanted the same size as her older sisters‚Äô ones so she was a little dissapointed but other than that it‚Äôs great and sturdy and sounds super good.

I got this for my husband and he uses it constantly, and it sounds great. He loves listening to music. A great gift that did not disapoint, you can hear it all over the loft apartment from one place. Clear sound

This is a very decent speaker.  Sound quality is very nice.  My father-in-law has a Bose (non-portable) speaker and I think this sound quality is better for a fraction of the price.  Interface and set-up is a snap.

We used to have this big, clunky speaker 2-in-1 combo that had a detachable, portable speaker...and then the dog ate through the cord. RIP. The JBL Flip is a powerful little speaker that's great for toting around the house or outside or wherever you're listening to things. I has the sound output of a bigger speaker with convenience and portability. I can hear it playing from the other end of the house, and it seems to have decent range when connected to the phone. I can pretty much go anywhere in my house without it dropping or stuttering. It's easy to use and sync with devices, too, which can be a weak point with bluetooth-connected devices. I haven't paid enough attention to the battery life, but so far it seems pretty reasonable compared to my dearly-departed speaker.

Bought this for my son at Christmas. Excellent sound quality, very loud - will definitely fill a good size room with thumping music. Battery seems to last a long time, included charger can keep you going all day.Says it's waterproof, we haven't tried that yet. Highly recommend.

Great speaker. Great sound. Great battery life. Bluetooth has no trouble connecting to my phone. Well put together mechanically. Not the cheapest speaker of this type, but worth the money in my opinion.

Pro: Great sound and volume, easily linked to multiple Apple products, very good battery life, getting splashed with pool water shows no effects.Con: plan out how far you want to space them - ours are outdoors around the pool and once in a while the sound stutters a little when synched up together. Not enough to merit dropping the rating, but if you have a big distance or interference between the speakers, you may need to juggle placement.

I wanted a simple bluetooth speaker to carry around, got this one because my friend has it too. Audio quality is really good, and the bluetooth range is notable too. The waterproofing is amazing, I take it in the shower almost everyday, and have fully submerged it in a pool, as well as drenched it with champagne. The stereo link works seamlessly with other JBL portable speakers. Will buy another soon!

Finally upgraded from my JBL Flip 1, which lasted many years and still works fine. I‚Äôm even happier with the Flip 4, mostly when it comes to bass output. For a speaker this size, sound quality is great all around and the primary reason to choose JBL over other manufacturers. It also gets very loud if you‚Äôre into that.

Battery runs out and it won't hold a charge when using USB. i have three. love them. No dents or any damage. Can't replace batteries without tearing it up. Will buy another brand that is not as good. Enjoyed it while they lasted. Had them for  years.

This speakers are the real deal, my friend has the bose mini soundlink 2 and I compared them with this and they perform just about the same. FYI bose are around $150. Good bass and all around speaker.

Powerful sound from this JBL Flip 4. When I listen to music I have to make sure that the volume is not too loud so as not to disturb others because this portable Bluetooth device is strong. This device is great for small gatherings or just listening to music while making dinner. I am very happy with this Bluetooth device and I would purchase it again.

I've been using this speaker for about two months now and really love it. The sound quality is excellent, and it easily connects every time to my computer and iPhone blue-tooth. I also bought the case for easy travel and protective storage.
I‚Äôve bought two of these jbls. Straight up phenomenal. Awesome bass and super loud. Connectivity is perfect.

Update:This speaker is well not very good I am not able to get not even 20 feet away and the speaker starts to have connection problems especially when you have something in its away for example a thin piece of cardboard. Advertised battery life is wrong last around 5 hours of playtime not 20 very disappointed.  Save up and buy flip 5 or later model.

This is our second JBL flip speaker in our family; the first one from many years ago us still just as perfect as when it was new. My son got me one for Mother‚Äôs Day so Id leave his alone. Smoothest EVERYTHING, and great sound. Quality product, durable and attractive to look at.

I would expect nothing less from JBL.  Plenty of volume, clear audio, good bluetooth reach and easy connectivity.  Very impressed.  I would definitely buy another one.  I own Bose Soundlink Micro and this thing blows it out of the water on tone and volume especially with the lower bass notes.

Absolutely best speaker I have ever bought. Has amazing base and amazing sound the battery seems to last pretty long. And so far I‚Äôve dumped it into the water many times and have never had an issue!

I bought this speaker June 21st 2018, and around January 2019 the speaker went out and the sound is awful. I don‚Äôt know if there‚Äôs a warranty on this or anything but to spend $100 on a speaker, it should last a little longer than 7 months.

The JBL Flip4 bluetooth speaker is a nice speaker to use, and I was able without much fuss pair it with my ipod touch.  The sound came through well via both ends and if you touch it either end while blasting some tunes, you'll feel it vibrating.  It's a nice size to hold in your hand, and you can easily put it around your wrist if so desired.

I‚Äôm in love. This is a great speaker. Has great sound and volume too. I use it a lot. I love the size too as I like to travel a lot. And I listen to music daily. I love that two devices can be hooked up to it at the same time too. Great quality too.
Bought this JBL for when I golf, go to the beach, sit in the back deck.....basically any chance I get I use it.Love the color options, chose mine because haven‚Äôt seen many of them around.

Sounds great!  I have an older version as well that has lasted so long and finally needed to get a new one. Really my only complaint w This one, is it says it‚Äôs battery last up to 12 hours!  I barely got 6 hours.

This thing rocks.  The bass bumps!  Link with your friends for surround sound.  Use at the beach at the park on your bike or skateboard.  Literally anywhere.  I was on a canoe that capsized, the speaker was at the bottom of a puddle, completely immersed in water still playing music!!  Took it out and kept on going.  AWESOME.  MUST BUY
but the design not so great - difficult to operate the on/off switch. And its round shape tends to, you guessed it, roll around.. (at least on my boat and forget about it in your car).

Sound is pretty good, bass could be better, heavy metal songs dont sound as good. Seems to be a hip hop/rap speaker more than a universal. Volume isnt too bad for size, and battery life isnt as good as advertised. Even if i listen to just podcasts the battery life will last about 9 hours straight before needing a charge

We have this outside 100% of the time (the porch is covered). A year later it's still going strong! No connectivity issues, good sound, and no visible wear and tear. Highly recommend for folks looking for a quality outside speaker.

This speaker packs a punch! Especially if you place it in a corner of a room, the sound just amplifies! I've even put it in a deep cardboard box (when I was moving) and wow! The bass gets deeper!  Try placing it under your kitchen cabinet in the corner and the sound is amazing.  Not bad for the size.  And it's rugged too.  Definitely worth the price.

Excellent purchase. I have has this for 2 years and I take it to the lake and I evern forgot it and left it out on the rain. Still works as new. Great purchase..5-26-20.  I dropped it in the lake.  Swam to get it. Found it. Towel dried it. And still works!! Whaaatt.  This is awesome üëå

WOW!! Very high quality!  Played it all day/ evening for Christmas Eve and could not get over how incredible this one small speaker sounds.  We are thrilled with it. Can play it very loud- and bass is rich and clear. I‚Äôve only had it for one day but for initial use the battery lasted for over 8 hours.I took it outside today to see how it sounded out there and again, AMAZING.

Also the victim of a not-waterproof speaker. I bought this for my daughter as a Christmas gift. 7 months later, she had a few friends over for a pool party, and the speaker got wet and died. It‚Äôs past the return window and I‚Äôm not happy!!

After getting this unboxed and plugged in I had to try it out. And I am truly amazed. Great sound and a breeze to connect. I now am going to have to give it to my wife which means I need to buy another for myself.

I absolutely love this. I love it and I recommend it. The battery life is awesome. The volume is perfect. Its also a nice size so it‚Äôs not a big bulky thing and not too small. It makes for a great gift. Decent price and great quality.

My sister has one of these speakers and loves it so I bought it.  The first time I tired it would connect via bluetooth but that was it.  Hasn't connected via bluetooth since the first day.  I've tried to pair with my iphone, laptop and Google Mini. None of them work.  So instead I connected via a cable to my laptop.  That worked once.  Now the audio goes in and out and I've tried multiple cables.  I'm so disappointed.  I feel I've wasted my money.

This product is very good, it automatically can connect to your phone and has great sound quality, the Bluetooth can cut out depending on distance away and potential thickness of the walls between but I had very minimal situations of that happening. I‚Äôd highly recommend, charging cord broke in my backpack so that‚Äôs partly my fault but wish it was a bit more durable luckily I had another cord that fit in the port so no issues here but be careful with the charging cord.

This is everything you could want for a speaker of this size and price! Amazing sound quality and volume for such a small speaker and the battery life lasts about 2 days from my experience (and I use it quite often). My package didn't come with a charger for some reason, but amazon was quick to provide a solution so no worries! This is a perfect speaker for outdoor activities like camping or skateboarding and is incredibly convenient to carry around! Highly recommend!

This was a surprise Christmas gift from my husband who knows how much I love audiobooks. I listen to them while I‚Äôm cleaning and was pleasantly surprised to learn that phone calls also come through clearly. It is easy to set up and use and the battery has a good lifespan.

Great little device, packs nice sound. Only issue I have with it is the battery life. Gets me through my work day for about 5 hrs of an 8 or more hour day. I dont plan to test the waterproof part of it not that I dont trust it I just dont work around water. I do however work in a body shop and it keeps us working with good vibes through the jb flip 4.

Love this! Just buy it. This speaker does justice to The Pretty Reckless, Pink, System of the Down, Ministry and any other music. Haven't found anything better in this price range. Going to have to add a 2nd for more sound
Last JBL product I will buy.  Won‚Äôt hold charge and sound is horrible.  Also bought earbuds and they stopped working within 6 months.  COWIN sells a much better product at a much better price.

Right out of the box it worked well. Sound is good and clear. Don‚Äôt know about battery longevity bc I just opened it. Thought it would be larger but sound is what I‚Äôm looking for. Sounds better than Sony s version.

I've only had 1 other cheap Bluetooth speaker, that i then attached to a Google Chromecast Audio  dongle, in the hopes that i could then purchase ANOTHER cheapy bluetooth speaker and ANOTHER Chromecast audio dongle in order to get crappy stereo sound.In the case with this JBL we cut out all the extra wires and setup for a very sleek , very small, yet very nice sounding speaker, that can eventually be linked with 100 other "connect+" devices
LO IDEAL ES QUE NO TIENE CABLE, UN SONIDO ESPECTACULAR, ESTE ES EL SEGUNDO QUE COMPRO, LO RECOMENDE A UNOS AMIGOS QUE VIERON EL MIO Y LES ENCANTO.

This is definitely one of the best items I have ever purchased from Amazon. The sound quality is amazing! The item actually looks much nicer in person than it does in the stock photo; it's a little brighter in person.

I will charge it for 3-4 hours or until all lights are solid. It will die or shut off 2-3 hours.  Sometimes  it will just shut off after a few songs. It has good volume and is light and compact but damn turning off all the time, i barely even use it because I'm sick it. Sometimes I'll have it on outside the bathroom during showers and it won't make it through a whole 15 minute shower even if I just take it off the charger or its showing a full charge.
