WOW what a great small gadget and its powerful with a great sound perfect for kayaking or sitting by the pool take to the beach.. we are most likely going to get another (hubs needs one) this one is MINE ‚ô°

The JBL FLIP 4 is an amazing speaker. Is it better than other speakers at half the price? Maybe not. Are you paying for a better warranty, product support, or user manual. My experience with these things would suggest not.

Fully charged night before. Awesome sound for two days till battery ran out. Would not recharge after the first charging. Wouldn't connect to Blue tooth. Tried different charging cables and adapters.  No luck

I love this speaker, I bought my wife a Bose revolve which was the best sounding speaker I had heard till I got this. The Bose is very nice, but the Flip 4 offers better mid range, and a voice forward sound to me. The fact that it's water proof is amazing, and the battery last forever at 50% or so. Great buy for this price range!

I purchase  2 for my house party but if I get more than 4 ft away from the speaker with my phone it loses signal and it doesn't pay. I have a flip 3 prior and I can be out side with the speaker and my phone inside it still worked but this does not , very disappointed .sync together well no problem
The speaker is great! It produces an amazing quality of sound for the size. Not to mention it is very durable! I would definitely recommend this for anyone looking into a portable speaker.

That a lot of sound comes out of a speaker this size isn't that big a deal - lots of small speakers are loud now. But the quality of that sound is second to none - that's a rarity. It has a fullness that you wouldn't expect from something this small. While certainly not the cheapest, you'll absolutely get a first rate product. Battery life is great too - especially if you listen at normal volumes. You won't regret getting this one !

I bought this as an early Christmas gift for my husband. He's a truck driver and he always complains that he can't listen to the music on his phone because his work truck doesn't have an aux port and his cigarette lighter is broken. So I purchased this for him. It has great sound quality and he can hear it clearly over the sound of his engine. It's an all around great product!!

I wanted one of these speakers for years after I heard the sound quality at a friend's house, I decided to bite the bullet and get one and I couldn't be happier. Battery does last 10 to 11 hours with constant playing on a full charge.

This speaker sounds great, and is way louder than most of us need for daily use. It connects to my iPhone easily and is compatible. I don‚Äôt struggle at all, I never read any instructions, very much just took out of the box and was all set. Very good bass, sounds equally great with music or podcasts. Excellent value.

While it does connect to a device quickly I didn‚Äôt like the fact that the battery doesn‚Äôt actually last 12 hours, it doesn‚Äôt even last 8hrs. I bought this to take with me to work, but I‚Äôm disappointed that it doesn‚Äôt last my whole shift even if I charge it till it‚Äôs full capacity. The sound is good for its size, you can hear the music clearly and the bass goes well with the speaker. Good enough, but I‚Äôll repeat again (as it was what made me buy this speaker in first place) it doesn‚Äôt last even 8hrs before the battery dies.

I'm a P.O. letter carrier and this is the perfect solution for listening to music in my truck or walking a route.  It's rugged and waterproof.  The sound is good and I usually only need half volume outside and a bit more inside the noisy truck.  The battery lasts me two full work days before I need to charge it.

Speaker is well built. Although it is decently loud, I expected a tad bit of more Bass for a JBL. Says 12 hours of play, but highly doub it, I fully charged it and played it for about 4 hours before it was less than half way. Overall I am happy with it and will be keeping it.

About 5 months of use my Flip 4 wouldn‚Äôt connect to the charging cable. The charging port had become loose. I called JBL and e-mailed them a screenshot of my Amazon order and they emailed me back a UPS label for return. I got a new Flip 4 about 10 days later. I‚Äôm very pleased with the speaker and especially the customer service.

Life is different and much more enjoyable. I use this on my tractor, in my truck, in the yard or barn. We take it everywhere just in case we want great sound. This and Amazon Music makes for a great time.

I expected more from this speaker. It has great sound as it is a step up from the JBL Flip 3. I had originally purchased the flip 3 and fell in love with it as soon as I began using it. The sound was a bit distorted when listening to certain songs on maximum volume. But after using it for only two days the distortion got worse with one song being particularly choppy and extremely distorted almost as if the sound was coming from a radio dispatch or a walkie talkie. I ended up returning it and upgrading to the Flip 4, which did live up to its expectations of having better sound. I haven't fully had the chance to test that out the battery life yet but I will give an update once that has happened. But one thing I am frustrated with is that I have only had the Flip 4 for about a week now and I just charged it once and the charger came apart! One use! For something so expensive I would have expected Better quality in the charger. The only reason I am not too upset is because I already have an extra android charger. That is out of luck. This should be fixed.

Great value for the price and good sound quality for the size. This speaker has been dropped by my kids and still works perfectly. I dont worry about spills or it being by the pool. Worthy purchase and I would buy again.

This is probobly the best mid range speaker of 2017, I love the sound quality, and the designs. The only bad thing is when unboxing it if you don't know what to expect the charger and manual may be thrown out, because they are kind of hidden in two smaller matte and glossy black boxes at the top and front of the inside of the box, but. Any thing aside from that is a 11 out of 10, the ipx7 waterproofing is amazing, it has a nice easy grip to it and a flawless design. I hoped this helped, and I say you should DEFINITELY buy this speaker

The speaker itself is awesome but stopped working after being exposed to a small amount of water at the beach. We attempted to charge it a few days later and it‚Äôs still not working. Definitely would not recommend the speaker especially when they advertise it as being water proof.
It sounds amazing.  The bass and clarity of this little speaker is more than I thought it would be.  I love it.

Omg the sound is amazing. My son loves it. Its been slashed with water multiple times and still works great. I haven't put it all the way in water I really don't think I'm going to either it's a speaker

I use this speaker when I‚Äôm teaching yoga class. Very easy to use and great quality sound.  Camouflaged speaker actually hard to see! How many times have I been racing  around my house looking for where I left this speaker- making myself almost late to teach!! Hindsight-A bright color would of been a better choice for me.

I absolutely love it!!! The color is even better in person! The sound is beautiful the base is perfect I have no complaints! Just pay the extra $10 for this color so worth it! (Teal) if you‚Äôre buying it for a gift omg they‚Äôll love it! If you‚Äôre buying it for yourself YOU DESERVE IT!

Portable and splash proof. I use it every day via bluetooth. The battery lasts for hours of continuous play. The slund quality is far better than I expected - the small subwoofer transmits bass very well! I was excited about that.

Oh my goodness. Everyone needs one of these now. The battery life is amazing and the speaker quality is out of this world. We spend a lot of time outdoors, and the sound is still perfect. The bass is popping and makes this worth the money. I‚Äôve wanted one of these for a while and finally went for it. I so glad that I did!

We purchased this for a recent vacation and it worked so well. The sound quality from this little thing was amazing. It connected easily to our phones and held a charge all day. We may buy another one for next year to have a surround sound effect out by the pool. Such a good product. You won't be disappointed.

Immiediayely after purchase aka brand new: it looses signal after 15-20ft, use with a treadmill on and the treadmill drowns out the noise pretty completely aka not strong/loud sound at all. Also, the battery is pretty poor, 2-3hrs of use max before I need to recharge it.Update: 2yrs later after 30min use battery is dead
Not an audiophile-- but WOW!  Don't know how something so small sounds so big!

Sounds awesome - waterproofing is effective  - perfect for travel.I reviewed this on my channel for a month and it quickly beat out the Fugoo Go as my favorite mini speaker. It booms well and sound is good for a living room or small backyard party.

To me, this is the best Bluetooth speaker you can find. I love the construction and the durability. Such a rich, detailed sound. I use this for a sound Spa meditation app and the sound is incredible. This goes to the beach and the park with us.

I love JBL, as a retired Professional DJ I mostly used JBL speakers in my performances and this little speaker works great. I do notice it's blue-tooth range is shorter than an earlier model I had, but this is my second JBL Flip 4 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Black, so I do stand by them for what they're made to do.

I  have a Marshall Stanmore. I like it. Its beautiful and fills the room with sound with clarity but it aint portable. This Flip4 is awesome. Its tiny, portable and sounds great. Its actually very loud. It might even be louder than the Stanmore. How did they do that? This is the loudest portable speaker I've ever heard.
After a full charge my speaker only lasts for about maybe 4 hours..... does anyone‚Äôs play music for 12 hours on a single charge?? I use it at work and it can‚Äôt even last an 8 hour shift üòí
We enjoy this speaker a lot!  The sound is good and it‚Äôs nice to be able to use it everywhere we go.

Brilliant new way to enjoy a Music. Don‚Äôt bother with headphones any longer, set it in my lap, on a pillow behind the back of my head or dance around with it In my backyard. So much fun, great  articulated sound. You‚Äôll find louder more appropriate speakers for group situations But this is spectacular for personal use

This product is amazingly waterproof. We went on a kayaking trip and tied the speaker off to the kayak. When I got out of the kayak I had no idea but the speaker went underwater, the music was stopped before the speaker went under so I really had no clue. After hanging out for roughly 10 minutes and going to get back in I realized that the speaker was under and thought it was completely done. I picked it up and turned it right on like nothing happened. The sound quality is also amazing! Absolutely would buy again!!

Shipping was very fast (even for a prime order I think it came next day!), box was in perfect condition.  Still testing out the sound quality but so far it seems great! I was between this product and the Bose sound link mini, but reviews suggested this had better base sound, overall I am glad I went with this speaker because it was cheaper and the sound seems pretty good for a smaller speaker.
We bought this for our beach trips, basically the party tends to move where ever this thing is playing!

The sound from this small speaker is really great- good highs and lows. It's cool that you can pair several of them together to play the same audio- my friend bought one of his own and we can use them together when we hang out.  Waterproofing seems effective, haven't had any issues using this near the pool where it has gotten some water drops splashed on it.  Can't beat it at the price point.

I am very impressed with this speaker. It is small but powerful, exactly what I needed for an small 2 apartment with a patio. Love that you can connect by bluetooth and aux cable. Dont like that you only can pair it with a few JBL speakers.

Not an authorized re-seller. Bought JBL Flip 4 with a 2 year warranty, after 3 months of light use, battery cell went out and warranty Asurio told me to contact JBL directly. JBL will not honor the warranty so I guess I'm out a speaker. Better off buying from JBL directly to get a warranty that will be honored.
Can't charge and play at same time.  Battery life not great at full power.

Ok, The first date I received this JBL speaker I was excited. The reviews were ok enough for me to make the purchase. I was really excited about battery life. I don't know if I received a defective one (happened to me before) but the battery on this thing doesn't last 2 hours on low. this is my 3rd week with this speaker and I haven't even used it that frequently. I'm really disappointed with the battery life. I honestly believe this one is a defect because I've only charged it about 4 times since I received it... back to square one I guess. I hope the good people at JBL fix this issue if not for me at least for next buyer.

I love it! Great sound quality out of a little tiny device. The battery lasts several hours so for sure to last your party for the night. Apparently you can link 2 or more of these speakers together via the JBL app but that app has bad reviews and people say it doesnt work... So not sure about that. But as far as this little speaker goes, it is great for your money.

I ordered it yesterday and got it today. Sounds amazing. I've always used cheaper speakers and obviously got what I paid for them üôÑ I heard JBL were good speakers so I had to try. Cant wait to use this for a while!

Compact design, easy to use, high quality sound rendition. Casing appears to be very eary to mark and possibly damage. Overall a great little product, i would recommend to a friend and buy another is i ever need one.
Great speaker. Bought as a gift for my wife and she loves it much better than the $25 speaker it is replacing. It sounds great with podcasts/audiobooks as well as music. No complaints.

Overall nice product for the price. Sleek and attractive design.  Bluetooth is fairly easy to install. Wish it had more buttons and control of music selection.  Love that it is waterproof. Wish it came with its own charger. Would buy again!

Wonderful sound quality for a great-looking small speaker!  If you are looking for a small speaker, you will love this one.  The only thing that is annoying (and why 4 stars instead of 5), is the tiny battery life!  You gave to charge it constantly!
I am so glad I bought it. It is definitely water proof got caught in the rain with it and worked perfectly in the rain and after. The sound is amazing. It‚Äôs the perfect size to take any where!
I purchased this for last year's mother's day gift for my wife.  She uses this daily when she baths and the sound quality is great.  Definitely much better than cheapo BT speakers.

I ordered this to replace our JBL Flip 2 that has worn out.  I ordered it based on a review that stated the battery life was longer than the Flip 3.  So far the Flip 4 has not disappointed.  The sound is great and has small subwolfers on the end which is a great improvement over the Flip 2.  It has been to the beach and we had zero issues with its performance.  We love the Flip 4!
It sounds great, and it connects via bluetooth without any issues (unlike the previous one I bought). I just hope it's durable; if it's not, I'll be back to update this review.

I was a bit skeptical about buying this speaker at first. When I got it I knew right away I‚Äôd be happy with it. Heavy, good construction and solid controls. Easy Bluetooth pairing and massive sound for a speaker this size. Totally blown away that a speaker this size can deliver this loud and crisp sound. Great buy and built to last.

Small, but POWERFUL!! Pairing 2 of them is awesome. I can't imagine how much better it would sound with 4 paired! The depth of sound, as well as the overall clarity of sound the speaker produces is unrivaled. Great product, especially for the price. I love my JBL Flip 4 and I'm sure you will too after trying it out!

Very clear and clean at moderate volume.  Sound kind of flattens out at high volume but that level is irritatingly high.  Will fill your den and kitchen with tunes that are clear and crisp.  Great value buy.

When I connected my phone and hear the sound quality THE SOUND QUALITY IS AMAZING MOST Definite BUY !! Cause I‚Äôm all about quality over quantity üíØ so if your like me most definitely purchase this YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED

I bought this for my daughter in Nov. it stopped holding a charge in June. For the seven months it worked it sounded good. Same scenario with her friend‚Äôs JBL portable speaker - it just stopped holding a charge.

Coming from the flip 3 Iwasnt expecting anything to be crazy new. There is a complete difference in the build quality and battery life between the two. Flip 4 has great water resistance which is very convenient when at the pool playing some jams. Any music type sounds great and the mini "sub woofers" make for great bass. Couldn't be happier with the portability considering its light enough to strap to my bag when going on a hike.

So perfect to take anywhere.  Awesome sounds and the beats are amazing.  Waterproof, small enough to fit in a purse or backpack, Bluetooth and long live for the battery.  I love this and take it everywhere!  Great price too!

This is the second time within 30 days I have received this speaker and both times it works perfe try fine with great quality music and great battery life, then the next day it won't turn on or says it died literally minutes after I had it on the charger for more than enough time. I'm so infuriated by this because music literally is played everywhere I go and this speaker won't even live longer than a day. I'm so agitated I don't even want it again.

Bought his for work - I facilitate classes in rooms from as small as a conference room to as big as a 200 person auditorium.  Worked right out of the box - no problems connecting with my laptop at all.  The sound is good - not high quality like my Bose I have for personal use, but good.  Not quite the range of highs and lows as my Bose.  Powerful enough to be heard in any size classroom.  Well worth the money if you are looking for a good quality speaker with decent battery life.

excelent flat sound. great volume for the size, better sound quality than my charge 3, but less volume.the only downside is that at 3/4 of max volume, battery doesn't last as advertised, but I didn't expect that anyway.

It‚Äôs perfect. Came as expected in great function. I take it to the beach and pool and even in the shower and it‚Äôs battery lasts for days. I love music so I‚Äôm constantly playing music on it everywhere i go.

Loved the look and feel. Bass is more than I need for my home use and I even bought two to use in party or stereo mode.Both modes worked fine. Stereo mode had a little lag to start the song on the second speaker. I hope it gets sorted out with updates

I bought this speaker to put in my UTV. The sound quality is awesome, but the battery life stinks. I was going to buy a second one for our other UTV, but I think I'll pass. If you're looking for something with a long battery life, this isn't for you.

Solid performer for its size.  Bought for my 2 kids to use indoor/ outdoor.  Nice overall clean & balanced sound while able to deliver good bass.  Will test Bluetooth range in the summer.  Having listened to Paradigm, Klipsch speakers in the house for over 20yrs, this Flip4 is pretty comparable in delivering clean sound.
Small but very loud. Good for a small gathering.

This portable speaker is great. Sounds good, even when the volume is at max. This matters because some portable speakers tend to distort the sound when they are at it loudest.  Great battery life too. The reason why I didn‚Äôt go with the 5 is that I cannot connect sync up my other jbl since they switched to a different system. Also, this is great when I go on my nightly walks on the beach with my friends.

I was debating spending the money vs just using my little cheap bluetooth I already had. I should have bought this sooner. It has great sound, great bass, and is indeed waterproof. I use it while golfing, in the shower, while cleaning and everything! If you have more money than I do or have friends with these speakers you can hook them all up together and blast the tunes! Oh, also, the connection process is the easiest ever. Now I just click the button, it connects in about 2 seconds, and we are jamming!!
There is way too much base and I wish I could adjust them.  I use them mostly to listen to my audiobooks but somethings it's hard to understand what they're saying because of the tone.

This speaker was wonderful--until it quit pairing with the computer. Now there is no blue backlight when I turn it on and I can only use it connected to the computer. I only used this inside the house...never dropped it...so the unit was not damaged in any way. Using it with a cord kind of defeats the purpose of having a speaker...so I have to give it a low rating.

We are so pleased with these speakers! My husband is an audiophile and loves the sound quality, and I love that we are now wire-free and can connect the music to multiple speakers at the same time. We use them everywhere, in different rooms around the house, in the shower, on trips. So versatile!

Easy to connect, great sound quality and long battery life. This was a great buy. We liked it so much we bought a second one to pair as well. With the app you can play multiple JBL units through one device.

Purchased in October 2019, absolutely love it. Accidentally I've dropped the JBL a few times, its been submerged in water and still works like new. Was delivered on time, nicely packaged and came with everything needed for it. Sound quality is very good and gets pretty loud. Has a great battery life, Bluetooth connectivity/distance I would say is pretty good. Small, lightweight, and easy to transport.
Doesn‚Äôt hold a charge anymore the original charging cable just stopped working so I had to used something else and keep Speaker on charger constantly or the speaker will die

This is my second Flip 4 the first I gave to my daughter after she came home on leave from the Coast Guard and fell in love with it. I may buy a third just to link two together to improve the stereo effect.

This thing not only sounds like a high-quality wireless speaker, it looks and feels like one too. The 12-hour battery life is more than enough. The bass is just enough without being overpowering, but is certainly present when it needs to be. Audio is clear at low and high volumes. Speaking of volume, this thing gets LOUD without compromising quality.  You really get what you pay for here. You can get a decent speaker for $20-30, but if you've got the budget and are looking for a really high quality, easily portable speaker, you can't go wrong with this one.

Everything about this speaker feels quality - from the packaging to the speaker itself, and even the charging cable. Very impressed. And then comes the sound. Very impressed with the sound quality. The size is also just right for my needs ... very portable. Definitely getting the Charge 4 next.

Excellent sounds quality for such a small unit. This thing gets hours and hours of play time and just keeps rocking. Built in base takes it over and above every other portable speaker out there. Jbl quality is top notch!

Speaker Lasted 18 months, despite buying a 4 year warranty Asurion is refusing to honor the same..wouldn‚Äôt recommend these products.. My speaker seems new, never exposed to water despite claiming to be water proof. Amazon should stand behind warranties bought through their web site, what‚Äôs the use of recommending warranty if the company doesn‚Äôt honor the same..I‚Äôm 67 and wouldn‚Äôt try to rip anyone off. If I but a warranty is to have peace of mind and be sure that the product last in good shape. Be careful about these products

Loved this speaker good quality. I don‚Äôt use it everyday......sadly I didn‚Äôt realize the battery had a shelf life. I have a Sound Core that I alternate between.....had it longer and still works like it was new. Guess I will buy another SoundCore.
Bought it to use while biking since it said its water proof and all. So far I like it nice and loud while riding and stayed firmly in my water bottle holder.

So I read all the reviews about the people who have trouble being able to charge their Bluetooth speaker after a few charges. It's probably because they're stupid enough to keep the USB cord charging in the speaker while playing at the same time. Don't do that you idiots! I don't have a problem with charging my speakers because I don't do that. I love these speakers I'm glad I bought them and it's a great investment.

this speaker is awesome and loud! I got this for a few reasons, i drive locally in some older tractor trailers and there isnt any radios in most of our trucks so this is handy playing music from my phone also gonna zip tie it to the front of my can-am and jam while ill ride. i got the camo and the pattern is amazing. it also will connect to other speakers. i would recommend and would purchase again.

These are great little bluetooth speakers. Weather proof,  good highs and bass, sounds great.  The app for multiple speakers,  JBL Connect,  only works over a very limited distance so disappointed with that but my Samsung supports multiple bluetooth connections and they work nicely using the Samsung feature.

This is my second purchase of this item. The first one I bought was about three years ago, and the battery life is pretty terrible now, but overall I am happy. It‚Äôs been a great speaker and has good sound. The cover is a good additional purchase .
This speaker is great for on the go music! My family uses it a lot at the beach, the battery life is very long and doesn‚Äôt take too long to charge! The sound quality is amazing
Bought for daughter (she picked out) and she still uses this all the time after having this for little over a yr. Still works great!! She picked out the teal color and it's beautiful.

I picked this speaker specifically because I wanted something that could fit into the water bottle holder on my bicycle.  It fits great, and the sound is fantastic. I use it all around the house now, and have brought it camping, too. It has excellent battery life.

This thing is AMAZING! Seriously, one of my favorite tech purchases to date. It‚Äôs ultra portable, a full charge will last however long you need it to and it is....LOUD! I mean loud!The sounds quality doesn‚Äôt suffer when it‚Äôs turned up. No rattles, no distortion, just amazing sound quality. Build quality is excellent as well.
I use everyday in my house. Country, rock and rap. It all sounds good. Easy to connect to Bluetooth and great battery life. Speaker is also pretty loud for its small size.
I bought this for around the house when I clean! I love it! We use the flip 3 for the shower, so if you want something to use while taking a bath or shower this is a must!

This is my second speaker.  Great product.  Have it tucked into a soap niche in a steam shower.  Works great.  Has fell several times from a height of over 7 feet several times onto tile and still works great!

I ordered this in June, to replace a prior model that stopped working.  My son just informed me now, that it did not come with a charging cord.  He was trying to use the old cord and it didn't work.  Not sure if it is too late to get a cord, but we cannot charge the speaker
I have always had the UE Boom speaker in the past and this one is so much better. The battery life is great, it connects to the blue tooth right away and it sounds great!

I used this July 4th at a community fireworks party. This fireworks display in the past was set to music through large  stadium speakers. Last year that stopped.  I brought the JBL 4 speaker today programmed through my phone.  The whole street thought the music was from the stadium speakers but it was my JBL.  Great sound with perfect balance of highs and lows. This made experience with the fireworks that much more enjoyable. I highly recommend this speaker.

The JBL Flip 4 has great sound and works extremely well for the price. I like the ability to link several of them together. The JBL app for Android is pretty clunky, but not the worst I've seen. Good value sound. Spend more money if you need good bass response, though. That's my only quibble.

We bought the black one bc it matches any room.  It arrived on time!  It was in perfect shape.  The quality of the sound is astoundingly awesome!!  It's hard to believe this little thing has such a big sound! I like this thing very much!
love this speaker.  easy to set up, great sound quality.

I love this speaker and would highly recommend it ....not too heavy to move from room to room and the sound is very good, not 100% when the volume is high but I would give it a high 80.  Excellent value for the money.

I bought this speaker shortly after my Dad had bought one and I found I was using it more than him because it was so fantastic! The two bass speakers on the side are pretty booming for its small, compact size. The quality of sound is more than a bang for your buck. The nice thing about this speaker is that it's water resistant, and can be charged and played at the same time (which wasn't possible with my old Sony speaker). Definitely an essential if you're a student who loves their music.

The speaker works as described but there are some room for improvements. Battery life doesn‚Äôt last as long as stated when used at 80% volume it only last half. Also the Bluetooth connection should have better info displayed on my phone like battery life and so on. Even my cheap $10 Bluetooth speaker has this feature.
Sounds good, works good, battery last's forever. I've had it for a couple months now and keeps on delivering. Let's hope it keeps delivering during the summer for camping and pool days.

This speaker is small but incredibly mighty. It is waterproof (i spilled something on it) and durable so far!The sound is high quality and at roughly 50% can be heard in my whole apartment. The controls on the speaker make it better than some other options for bluetooth speakers available. 5 stars - would definitely recommend.

I purchased the white jbl flip 4 as an upgrade to my old bicycle speaker. It has superior depth and bass compared to my old generic bike speaker. I also learned quickly that it is a great outdoor speaker in general. I enjoy it so much I also bought a teal one for use everywhere besides my bike.
This speaker is perfect! Compact, easy to use and sounds GREAT!! The battery life is good and having that little handle is awesome! You can hang this up to help fill a whole room with your music.

These little speakers are phenomenal.  I consider myself somewhat of an audiophile, and I have some of the older JBL compact models.  These are the best sounding compact speakers I've heard, and the bass for such a small speaker is also hard to believe.  For the price and being waterproof, I doubt you would do better than these.
I bought this thinking that the battery would last about 6 to 8 hours on full blast....it did notOnly lasted about 3hours..just like the JBL flip 3.
Fantastic speaker!  Would recommend to anyone who is interested in purchasing a speaker.I have 3 around the house and each still work great and sound great.
We have had this speaker for years and it is high quality in material and sound. It's also a convenient size to move around. We have gifted this same speaker to family.
This little thing gives a good punch!! I use this one and my wife's to connect together and its like having surround sound. Great little speaker!! If you are the fence, this is a great buy!

I bought this speaker to use in our pool area. The sound is amazing and the speaker is easy to pair with your iPhone once you download the JBL connect app. I‚Äôd really like to buy another one to pair it with in the future. This speaker is great value for the money. JBL has never let me down.
after reading all of the reviews i selected this one despite the higher costI could not be happier with my decision

I like the sound, the look, and it charges relatively quickly. However, we've had it about a year and it started shutting off randomly and the speakers are "popping" like they are distorted. The speaker we owned before this lasted about 5 years before suffering a battery defect, but the sound and quality were consistent for 5 years. I expect better from JBL, especially for the cost.

I've been shopping around for a portable speaker a while. In the past I've bought the cheaper ones from like Ross/TJ Maxx and those never lasted long or performed how I needed them to. JBL 4 caught my eye because I didn't want to spend more than $100 for a speaker but I also wanted it to be good for days at the beach or small get togethers at home.  It's been about a month now and I couldn't be happier. This is the best in the market if you're looking for sound quality, battery life, and volume 10/10 recommend!

Great speaker. Best in class as far as price amd size. It holds a charge for hours and fills a large indoor area really good. It gives me issues after dunking it in water for like an hour but then its back to normal. Solid buy. If mine breaks ima get another. Ive had for like 8 months rn.
LOVE THIS SPEAKER!It's small and very portable.  For its size, it puts out a pretty big sound. The battery lasts a ridiculous amount of time and it connects with my phone easily.

Great speaker for those looking to stay under $100. Easy to pair and play. When charging, it lights up with different dots to show you the progress up to when it is fully charged. Nice and sturdy with enough weight to produce nice, full sound. The bass won't blow you away with these kinds of smaller bluetooth speakers, but this one has sufficient enough to satisfy. And it looks great. JBL quality. What I expected and what I got.

No where near 12hrs..maybe with volume real low can get 6-8hrs but i have it at 3/4 up and say 3-4hrs is it then its on last dot. Guy at work has beats pill and sound isnt as good but battery is crazy long on high.

Amazing... This is actually the second one I've bought... because I wanted 2, not because the first broke. The volume, and quality of sound it can put out, on top of being compact, easy to use, water and weatherproof. Uses the same charger as your phone for extra convenience.

The Bluetooth stays connected at a greater distance than my Bose Soundlink mini 2 did. The sound quality is good but does not have quite the bass as the Bose had but that can be a good thing because the Bose had far too much bass at times. I used the JBL for a few hours outside at almost maximum volume and the battery was still at maximum.
I‚Äôm not a highly sophisticated ‚Äúsound guy.‚Äù However, I find this to produce very good sound, is extremely easy to connect, and for the price, I highly recommend it.
So far After about a month very satisfied. Battery life is amazing I listen to it every day for a few hours and it lasts almost a week. Sound is great. Connects easily.  Good item
Mom loves it, she can take it to the pool, put it on the patio during a cookout and we use it for our bonfires.  I great little speaker for mom to tote around with her. She loves it.
A must have in your bag for any reason. Fits nicely in bottle holder on my bike for great music on long rides. Sound is incredible.
Purchased the 5, but later found out it couldn't be wired so I purchased the 4 and now use it for phone, computer and TV. Haven't figured out how to get Alexia's voice over it??

My friend has a portable Bose and I was looking to purchase the same. It was 100 more than the jbl, but I went with this model after reading the reviews. I am very impressed with the sound quality and the extra savings with the money.

I am very impressed with the sound and the quality.I would buy this speaker again.

Sounded good until it inexplicably stopped working. It sat on a table top, never left the house, moderate use for music and movies on my laptop. Done after 6 months. I can buy a speaker for half that price if I want something that will only last for 6 months.

This is a great little speaker. The battery life on it is a long time. Charges fast sound is strong.I suggest you buy a protective case.

I bought two of these for my daughter's graduation party I ended up not using them for her party I use them when I do housework or outside work and find that ends up shutting down. the battery doesn't hold a charge for very long at all. I am highly disappointed and highly don't recommend buying this product.
Make a stupid noise when you power up and power down....ugh....hate that....but therest is all good. Music is perfect / not as heavy bass as bose...but just as good quality

When paired, one of the speakers often goes in and out.  They are not far apart from each other.  I got a white one and a blue one.  Doesn't matter which one I pair.  Disappointed as the quality is effected.  Use frequently at cookouts, etc.

Got this to replace a UE Boom we had and left on vacation. The sound on this is far superior to our old one and I‚Äôll be buying a second as they can all be linked together producing more sound. This is a great speaker. Light and powerful and deceptive for its tiny size. Buy it.

Honestly, this speaker is awesome. Took this on a recent beach vacation and it was a huge hit. Very easy to tuck away in a bag ‚Äì not super heavy like speakers I‚Äôve had in the past. Whether we were hanging at the beach or playing a game of cards inside, this speaker worked perfectly. Highly, highly recommend.

Bought this as father's day present and we use it all the time.  Incredible sound for it's size -- nice bass, treble is appealing (not screechy at all), lightweight, easy to throw into a beach bag or grab for the yard, and holds a charge for longer than expected.  Great product and fair price for quality.

I live this speaker. The teal colour is even prettier in live. The volume can be ridiculously and it takes forever for this battery to die, I have not charged it since I've bought it. Pairing with devices is easy and quick and only needs to be done once. I'm extremely happy with my purchase.

my sister has this speaker and i love it, so i bought one for myself. i bought it new, have had it only for couple weeks, and the volume and play buttons don't work. i can press down hard on the pause/play and it stops, but only for a second. it works fine other than that, i can adjust the volume and stuff on my phone, but the buttons on the actual speaker are broken and serve no purpose.

Amazing little speaker that is simple to use and blasts out some amazing sound.. Love that you can connect with up to 100 other speakers.. even one other gives some great stereo sound. Looking forward to using this by the pool this summer.
Really love this! Good bass, great overall sound, only wish it could (maybe?!) go a little louder - although I‚Äôm sure my neighbors are glad it doesn‚Äôt LOL Really good value.

I was a little disappointed when I got this. I‚Äôve had the OG JBL Flip for years and the battery was always so impressive. This battery is not nearly as powerful. Sound quality is good. Durability is good but the product is a bit heavy if your a backpacker.

Wow, I purchased other speakers over the years, but this thing rocks. Mine travels with me in my backpack and provides great listening time in my hotel room. This is listed as for the Flip 4, but mine was a Charge 3.

My family has always used JBL products. This did not disappoint. This product is loud, durable and my favorite part is it connects to my phone as soon as I turn it on. At this point I would recommend it to anyone needing a small form factor Bluetooth speaker with room filling sound. Rap, classic rock, classical, I have tried it all and sound is awesome!
Wow. Pay a little more, and get SO much more. This is the best of its kind, given what I've seen. Really love the portability and sound quality from such a little device. And that's from a Bose user!

I love this speaker. The sound is fantastic, especially for its size. And it‚Äôs loud enough for many different environments. It was easy to set up the Bluetooth connection.  This is the second one of these speakers that I have purchased. I loved the first one so much that wanted to try paring a second.  I can‚Äôt wait to try.

Bought this for my teenage son. The entire family loves it and we fight to share it! Has great sound quality, perfect size and the battery lasts a good long time. My daughter now put one on her Christmas list! Thanks JBL for such a great product at a reasonable price!

I love this speaker! It's the best. Better than any other bluetooth speaker I've owned. The sound quality is excellent, the battery life serves the purpose I need and it's durable on top of all of that. Great product and I would recommend it.

This speaker was better than i thought it would be.  Great sound, decent bass.  Mids and treble sound really good.  IT is waterproof...it went for a swim in the ocean by accident and works flawlessly still!  I want another one to use the JBL connect plus feature.  Great for the price

im so unhappy because my speaker doesnt sound. dont know what just happened but its turn on but it literally doesnt sound.

Arrived promptly. Just beautiful! Sound is EXCELLENT. Beautiful in white. 100% happy. Exceeded my expectations. Speakerphone is excellent. Friends tell me I sound crystal clear talking on speakerphone.

I love these speakers. I purchased one for my son another for my daughter and one for myself. The battery life, though decent, could last a little longer. It would be great if it would make it through my entire work day. by today's standards though it is Top Shelf.

Got this for my husband for his Birthday... He loves it, It has a big, strong, rich sound and the price was excellent. It works perfect with his iphone , and he used all afternoon and it still shows as fully charged... I only wish I had bought it sooner!

battery is garbage. Will not maintain charge even while plugged in. I.have several friends with same problem.  can't even play when plugged in to usb charge. Got square trade warranty and that is garbage as well. Don't bother.

I tried to return this product but Its saying the return time is closed. I love this speaker! Blows my Bose Soundlink mini out of the water! ( speaking of water...haven't tested the waterproofness yet ) The sound is amazing, connects quickly and easily. Absolutely love it. Can't imagine using anything else!

Sounds geeat!  I bought this speaker for my teenage son.  It had to replace a speaker he had that he dearly loved but it got stolen.  So this flip4 speaker had big shoes to fill. Besides the bad reviews, I love this speaker. It has great bass as well as volume. I am very happy with this purchase. Will most definitely purchase again in the future!

I love it! I've been doing some "back to school" cleaning around and the speaker in my phone only gets so loud...but this speaker! Oh lord, the sound is crisp and clear and the turquoise color is super cute. JBL doesn't disappoint.

Amazon, it appears, does not allow it to be returned, though it is less than one year since purchase. I will reach out to JBL, but for now...oh, well.
Love this speaker. Went through two Oonzt Angles before I decided to try JBL. Sound quality is superior in every way and the music, no matter how loud, doesn't vibrate the speaker like the Oonzt did.

Easily connects to my iPhone 6s Plus and it is loud!  Very pleased with the quality of the sound and you can actually feel the bass pumping out.  Charged it initially and have used it a bunch of times without a problem.  Quality item for a good price.

Charging stopped and won‚Äôt turn on or reset!? This thing works great just to have a little music at the beach or around the house or in the backyard. Everyone in my family has purchased one and loves it.

This is for the JBL Flip 4.  Sound distortion at higher volume beginning at about 75%.  For $30 more the Bose SoundLink BT Speaker 2, which I purchased a couple of months ago, has much better sound quality.

Using this as a Bluetooth speaker for my laptop and streaming to a projector.  The sound is amazing compared to other Bluetooth speakers I have.  You get what you pay for!!

Bluetooth/Phone links in two seconds. It‚Äôs loud for its size. Smaller than expected but love that it‚Äôs water resistant and tested it in a light storm during a party. Plays perfect a week later. Stand it up for 360 sound which is awesome!!

A powerful speaker with really good sound, a long battery life. Very durable it seems. I only got this speaker a few days ago but I bought it because I‚Äôve used it before. Once on vacation and my cousin had one we used to get high and have really lit jam sessions. I love this thing and all the awesome memories it‚Äôs brought me!! I

Connected to my bluetooth super easy and fits right on my nightstand. Small and sleek. I like it, happy with the purchase.
This is my baby! I bring this everywhere with me! When I clean it‚Äôs super loud in the house and great for the beach! Love the color as well! Lasts hours if fully charged!
i have a few bose speakers and this one does a pretty good job comparable and cheaper for the money.  this is also pretty durable - use it at the beach and tailgating.....highly recommend.

Excellent product. I am just in love with this product. Very happy with its buy. Still working at its best. I dont think I will ever switch to other brand than JBL. Absolutely loving this piece.

Easy to set up. Very Good sound quality.  I wish it was flat on both ends so it could stand up without being tilted. That being said, it has fallen off the shelf several times and is still working well.

Purchased this for our family trip to Florida. The sound quality is amazing, it is smaller than I anticipated (which is a good thing) light weight making it so easy to carry on the airplane. I will be purchasing again for each family member since we all enjoy different styles of music.

We just bought for an upcoming trip. Easy to pair phones and it sounds awesome! We now use outside when working and I'll be taking to the pool. I love the size and bought a hard case as well!
This thing is rad! Battery lasts a long time. I just toss it in my purse and the music keeps on playing when I drive anywhere. Siri doesn‚Äôt hear me call her name on it though - bit frustrating

product worked great for three months then just stopped working one day. I have tried multiple times to contact the company but I cannot get hold of anyone. The amazon link takes you to another company. I will update this post if they contact me.
Bought as a Christmas present for my wife and it was well received. Sound is awesome and the quality is what you would expect from JBL. Also like the fact you can link multiple speakers together.

I love how clear it sounds going to buy another for surround sound I needed it for camping but liked it so well I'm getting another feels good and plugs up to my battery packs so it never dies all day last a long time that way  for me  charge the speaker and battery your good. Reviewed tons of speakers and narrowed it down to the JBL Charge 3 and the JBL Flip 4.  Considered the Charge 3 just to have more boom and extra battery life, but ended up going with  the Flip 4 just because its more compact. The sound quality is great however, EVEN when you have it charger it will die on you so BEWARE! I purchased this after losing my beats pills (btw a great speaker..plays music while Charger). This speaker gets a 3 star. CHARGE IT TO THE FULLEST if you wanna use it half a day!

This is an awesome speaker!! You can use it paddle boarding or around d the house. Puts off great sound and it small in enough to throw in your pack easy!!

Recently it's at the point that it dies even when it is plugged in, and I know it's dying when it starts to make an awful squeaky farty sound. I've taken great care of this speaker- it has spent most of its life on a shelf. I would like it to have lasted more than two-ish years.

I use this to blast music throughout my house when I clean or am just hanging out. I don't think I've even gotten close to its volume capabilities, and it has been plenty loud. You could take this on a trip without the charger and not worry about it losing charge.
I cant review this purchase as it will be a Christmas gift and has not been used at all.  I did experience easy ordering, good price and quick and exact delivery as promised.  No complaints so far.
Bought this a year ago for my adult son. Has used it outside, by the pool, on the boat. Works well, sound is good. Great buy.

This thing packs a punch! JBL never disappoints... I bought this speaker because I lost my beats pill and was originally going to buy another, but this is much cheaper, waterproof, and sounds a little nicer in my opinion.. therefore, well worth my money!!
Great sound but it seriously only lasts only 4 hours. It is not ideal for a party. The sound is great and that is why I gave it 3 just for the sound.

I always buy something from amazon and I always been satisfied but I wasn‚Äôt satisfied with this order I never gave someone a 1 star before but I got to give this item a 1 star .. it Did not work it wasn‚Äôt turning on & charger was missing .
LOVE it! Great quality, great sound! I highly recommend this product to anyone who is looking to purchase a bluetooth speaker.

JBL hope its just a bad device . now 3 months after the warranty ended, it doesnt hold a charge. It dies after 10 minites on a full charge, then i have to plug it in and it shows a full charge. Then i can use it agai. For 10 minutes.  Unless i keep itplugged in then it'll work

This speaker is perfect.  I have one in the kitchen, office and an ‚Äúoutside‚Äù one.  Sounds great, battery lasts forever and they can take a beating!

Excellent! Extremely happy, excellent packaging, two second set up, came charged, easily connected and was listening to excellent sound quality within moments of getting package! Highly recommend!

We have a couple of these of various generations and we've been very happy with them. They sound great for the money, easy connection through BlueTooth, and the battery lasts long. We've had no issues with them.

This speaker is great. I needed a 2 speaker setup for work and home use, where one would sit on my toolbox while a second would travel around in a service cart with me. I had considered MiniRig due to hifi sound quality, size, unlimited daisy chaining, great app options and dedicated subwoofer but ultimately the lack of play/pause/volume buttons on the speakers as well as price drove me away. I decided to try one of these, and just ordered a second now that I have checked sound quality. JBL told me if the speakers time out when connected (if you have media not playing for example), they will lose their link and you will have to reconnect them. I had trouble finding that information and had to call, so hopefully it helps someone else. JBL said they would implement this feature in the future where they would relink on power up, this would open up options of having full room wireless setups semi-permanently arranged, would not have to pick them all up and connect every time. I will chime back in here with comments once I've thoroughly tested using 2 of them at once, in and outside of work.Pros:

I needed a small, bluetooth enabled speaker with good range that is well priced, sounds good and has decent battery life. This did the trick. Ive had it a couple of months with no complaints. Since I do not use it outside I cannot speak to its water resistant capabilities however it is doubtful I would take it with me on a shark diving tour or to a tropical beach excursion during monsoon season. On the other hand; if you do choose to take it with you on what is billed as a three hour tour and become lost at sea then I suppose the red Flip could be used a signal buoy. I am fairly certain that is why jbl offers one in that color. The lanyard is a nice touch, makes transportation from here to there more convenient if you have tiny hands and cannot grasp the speaker itself. I did not try the jbl connect app. Stopped dead in my tracks upon reading the eula where it says google analytics will manage data collected by the app, plus you have to allow the app to know your location. Why does anyone need to know my location as a condition for modifying settings on the Flip and what "analytics" are collected by goozle? Sounds a lot better than I have imagined, loud, crisp and with enough bass without being way too much (some other speakers I found them poorly balanced, with too much bass).This being said, there is one thing that managed to really really bothered me, after owning this speaker for several months, and even makes me want to sell it sometimes: Each time the speaker turns on, turns off, or connects to a device, it plays REALLY loud sounds. Really loud sounds you cannot change nor disable. A really poor design decision that makes me think twice before considering buying another JBL speaker. I would recommend you to watch video reviews to listen to the sound and evaluate yourself if you want to wake up your family or neighbors every time you turn on your speaker at 2AM.
